Title: MonoRace
ShortDescription: MonoRace is a cheerful electric unicycle racing where you can explore tracks and get points by performing tricks. Try the game in VR and PC versions with unique controls.

Title: D.R.I.F.T.
ShortDescription: An open-world space simulator where you explore star systems, manage resources, and take contracts to survive. Trade, diplomacy, and risk blend in a dynamic galaxy where every choice matters.

Title: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Edirne
ShortDescription: Retro Classicvania horror game starring Vlad the Impaler Dracula who's descending into the dark dungeons of Edirne to recruit a great warrior sentenced to death, at the hands of a man-eating inquisitor.

Title: Pay 2 Win: The World is Mine
ShortDescription: Manage your own game studio and go INFINITE in this new deckbuilding strategy game! Make unique combos for huge results, find secret synergies, item upgrades, and powerful rewards. Decide your own fate and take over the world!

Title: 诛仙剑阵
ShortDescription: 《诛仙剑阵》是一款由团队历时一年匠心研发的超变传奇手游，以“无首充、无套路、无强制消费”为核心，打造全民公平竞技的热血世界！新手开局即享“珍稀称号+自动拾取/回收+超大容量背包仓库”四重豪礼，零氪玩家每日登录可领充值额度，首爆奖励、千万灵符、万元充值疯狂派送，真正实现“打怪爆一切，散人逆袭成大佬”！

Title: I Sell Lemonade: Prologue
ShortDescription: You’re the boss of the block. Sell lemonade, make cash, get a bike, impress the girls — and live the summer you’ll never forget.

Title: Piczle World of Puzzles
ShortDescription: All your favourite logic-puzzles in one feature-rich package, Piczle World of Puzzles is the ultimate in picture logic-puzzling!

Title: Предновогодняя сказка
ShortDescription: A Drow named Violet teleports to our world to find the missing piece of the family pendant. The predominant genre of the game is a romantic comedy with elements of a visual novel, and a movement system from classic JRPGs.

Title: Coin idle
ShortDescription: Get rich quick with our Coin Idle clicker game.  Every 3 hours, you can collect up to 9 coins to grow your fortune!

Title: Splinter Colony
ShortDescription: A modern recreation of the 1994 4x strategy game, Reunion. After many generations of being separated from Earth, the colony is self-sufficient enough to develop a mission to reconquer and reunify Earth.

Title: Boba Tea Shop Simulator
ShortDescription: Make various drinks and boba teas. Interact with the world using game's hilarious physics, doing the chores that every tea shop manager get to encounter.Make smart investments with your money or buy decorations to customize your own shop to grow your tea shop into a world-known brand.

Title: Exoria
ShortDescription: An action-adventure game where a grappling hook lets you explore, solve puzzles, and fight fluidly on your quest for the mythical sword Exoria.

Title: Flee the fallen
ShortDescription: Flee the Fallen is a thrilling 2D zombie survival game where you fight relentless undead, switch between powerful weapons, and battle through intense encounters. Every moment tests your reflexes, strategy, and will to survive.

Title: Exodus: The Colonization of Space
ShortDescription: Colonize a galaxy in 256 colors! In this RiscOS gem from 1997, the fate of human civilization lies in your hands. Travel the stars, claim uninhabited planets or fight over them against your alien opponents. Your ultimate chance to relive the original experience, on the PC for the first time ever.

Title: The Father's Story
ShortDescription: Set in the first century, The Father's Story is a visual novel which offers different perspectives of the birth of Christ and the events surrounding that night. It is a bold Christmas story which dares to ask the question: "What else happened?"

Title: 圈套scheme
ShortDescription: This is a first-person simulation management game where you need to purchase items or produce robots as prizes to set up a ring toss mini-game. You can also design lottery schemes, print and sell tickets to operate a store and earn assets. Complete periodic tasks within the limited time.

Title: Among the Stars
ShortDescription: Among the Stars is a competitive 2D rhythm game featuring a minimalist, modern and space-themed visual style, along with an electronic soundtrack. Enjoy regular esports competitions and a built-in level editor to create and share unique levels.

Title: A Cozy Classics: Color Lines
ShortDescription: A calm modern version of the 1992 puzzle classic with cozy visuals, smooth animation and relaxing sound. The game is made for players who enjoy quiet, thoughtful puzzles and the calm satisfaction of planning each move.

Title: Squarepinski
ShortDescription: A cozy jigsaw game with a twist; every piece is the same shape, but not the same size! A low-pressure experience with chill piano music and gorgeous hand-drawn line art.

Title: Merlin Survivors
ShortDescription: Camelot is under threat! Merlin Survivors is a game where rogue-like action meets fast-paced survival challenges. Take control of legendary characters like Merlin, Arthur, Lancelot, and Morgana, and fight against relentless waves of enemies. Master each character.

Title: The Legend of Pamperlotte
ShortDescription: The Legend of Pamperlotte is an upcoming tactical RPG in a fantasy world with crazy quirks to make the battle go frantic! Enjoy the "Tactical Combo" and "Turn Again" system to claim victory on the battle field! But beware! The enemies can turn it against you!

Title: Fins of Fortune
ShortDescription: Fins of Fortune is a 2D fishing adventure where exploration meets progression. Catch a variety of unique and diverse fish, upgrade your gear, and unlock new areas on your journey to become the ultimate fisherman.

Title: Pocket Gecko
ShortDescription: A cute gecko lives on your screen! Capture bugs, keep them for special bonuses or sell them to buy upgrades and customize your gecko. Watch it wiggle while you work or play!

Title: Hidden Cats vs Zombies 2
ShortDescription: Hidden Cats VS Zombies is a hidden object game – the player's task is to find cats hidden on the map and eliminate the zombies. The game is designed in a zombie apocalypse style, but with a touch of humor.

Title: Wild Growth
ShortDescription: Wild Growth is a short, actionpacked incremental healer game set in a grim norse world.

Title: Toroban
ShortDescription: Toroban is an infinitely wrapping puzzle game.

Title: And Eyes To See : Escape Room
ShortDescription: This is a story about a regular person. A person living in an attick apartment, struggling somewhat to make ends meet. Then, something rather odd happens ...

Title: Agents 4 Hire
ShortDescription: Defend and Clean Mr. Wong’s suburban supermarket. By day shoppers will come shop but they leave a mess! And by night the hungry "Zombies" come for their revenge. As his trusted Agent that was hired for this job, it’s up to you to protect the store and your own skin!

Title: [omni-dissonance]
ShortDescription: You've awoken, after your crew has vanished. Drift through its otherworldly architecture to collect the black boxes containing their neural data and read fragmented clues to what drew them here.

Title: Terminal Defense
ShortDescription: The only tower defense game in the world that is played in the terminal. I didn't make this game because it was a good idea, I made it because I thought it was cool.

Title: Sheva
ShortDescription: Sheva is a card-based fighting game where both players act simultaneously in strategic 1v1 battles. Predict your opponent, adapt your deck, and master the chakras as you sharpen your skills with every run.

Title: My Goth Girl
ShortDescription: Your very own goth girl that ignores you while you work! For the very first time you can have someone to be lonely with together!

Title: Cython Cat
ShortDescription: Cython cat is a openworld speed platformer, play as Miru and explore the lands of the Cython Ruins. Find shards, keys and furballs, scattered around to unlock different areas. Enjoy roaming around the world, at high speeds.

Title: Rainy Night
ShortDescription: Rainy night is a Survival Horror game with resource management, sparse ammo and puzzle solving.

Title: Obfuscation
ShortDescription: Escaping from a car trunk, you find yourself in the garage of a mysterious house, with no memory of what happened. Step inside this first-person psychological horror experience and uncover the truth buried deep in the dark.

Title: Seven Scarecrows
ShortDescription: In the quiet dusk of abandoned fields, an endless cycle unfolds. As a solitary figure, you find yourself revisiting the same hushed evening, where spooky shifts emerge with each repetition.

Title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion
ShortDescription: A cosmic battle awaits! Choose between 15 Marvel heroes in this frenetic action beat ‘em up to fight against the deadly Annihilation Wave threatening the galaxy. From New York City to the depths of the Negative Zone, the future of the Marvel Universe will be fought for across the stars!

Title: Legends of Cumans
ShortDescription: You're the last surviving Elf who must find the Secret Sword, the only weapon capable of defeating the immortal Lord Velomdor.

Title: BLEEDOUT
ShortDescription: A minimalist Roguelike × Idle: click a tile to mine a resource - while your lifeline constantly drains. Food keeps you alive, materials fuel your research.

Title: Ironwood Conquest
ShortDescription: Medieval RTS game with building, management, and online multiplayer battles. Climb the ranks, play casual games, or create custom matches. Battle against computer opponents or challenge friends and foes in thrilling multiplayer battles.

Title: Miracle Vibe Show VR
ShortDescription: Try an exciting performance in which all space around you becomes the stage. Watch the metamorphoses and impressive effects, discovering more and more in virtual reality!

Title: It's Not You, It's M.E
ShortDescription: A short narrative point-and-click about living with limited energy — and how even the smallest tasks can feel impossible.

Title: Grandma, Is That You?
ShortDescription: “Grandma, Is That You?” is a psychological horror game. As we visit our elderly and ill grandmother to help her, the old mansion reveals buried memories and dark secrets. The line between reality and illusion begins to blur.

Title: The Art of Reflection
ShortDescription: Traverse mirrors as if they were natural extensions of space to solve puzzles and uncover secrets. Reshape your perspective to perform gravity-shifting acrobatics as you jungle-gym through a sprawling environment. You'll never look in a mirror the same way again.

Title: GRIBOUILLE
ShortDescription: GRIBOUILLE is an exploration game set inside my sketchbook. You travel through the pages I drew every day for a year. It’s a simple, personal little adventure where I share my drawing journey through a 2D platformer.

Title: Pax Autocratica: Prologue
ShortDescription: Free stand‑alone Prologue. Shape a grand colony where every life bends to your will. Feel the weight of absolute power as you decree laws, then march into chaos, leading squads in roguelite FPS battles from brutal skirmishes to large-scale battlefields. Play Sector One now & wishlist the full game.

Title: Rift Investigations
ShortDescription: Investigate procedurally-generated noir mysteries in a post-apocalyptic world where reality fractures and truth is subjective. Question suspects, search crime scenes, and deduce the truth from lies in this AI-powered detective game where every case is unique.

Title: Swordmancy
ShortDescription: Become a Swordmancer, warriors capable of using an arsenal of living weapons to defeat their enemies. Level up, get upgrades and evolve your weapons into stronger versions in this roguelike survivor game!

Title: DeAnima
ShortDescription: DeAnima is a brutal yet rewarding dungeon crawler steeped in classic roguelike tradition. Set in a sprawling, medieval dungeon, you embody a lone wanderer seeking the fabled Crown of Nivek.

Title: The Mailman
ShortDescription: Step into the shoes of a house sitter who thought the job would be easy—but in a quiet neighborhood stalked by a killer mailman, survival becomes the real challenge. Go about your daily tasks—watering plants, checking the mail, and keeping the house in order—but be mindful not to get caught!

Title: Postal Strike
ShortDescription: Play as a Postie dispatching hordes of enemies. Get stronger with unique letters and deliver as much mail as you can. The post must get through in this top-down, cosy, survivor-like.

Title: Ecopunk
ShortDescription: Ecopunk is a survival and colony management simulation game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Balance survival, resource management, and hope as you guide your colony through the ruins of civilization.

Title: Solo Chess
ShortDescription: The chess roguelike deckbuilder. Solo Chess is a cozy strategy game where you play chess-themed cards on a 3×3 grid, trigger piece effects, and earn points through clever combos. Build your deck with pets and food to conquer waves of unique battles.

Title: Shotgun Sunday
ShortDescription: In Shotgun Sunday explore a vast world, with secrets around every corner. Filled to the brim with quests, comedic npc's, unique enemies, boss fights, tight platforming, and loot! All in the pixelated Metroidvania world of Slobberville.

Title: Rank the zombie double pack
ShortDescription: Cartoon horror chaos in two platformer and shoot 'em up games! Run, shoot, fly, and float through varied levels, battling evil. Features classic soundtracks, simple controls and 30–40 minutes gameplay in these mini adventures. Join Rank's afterlife adventure!

Title: World War Chess
ShortDescription: This is 1000+ player chess! You are in a war, where every player matters and contributes! Your king is no longer the center of the world, but rather your Commander's king, a bossfight piece, is the new captain, and must be protected at all costs. Can you carry your comrades to victory?

Title: Leaf Blowing Simulator
ShortDescription: Leaf Blowing Simulator is a cozy co-op job simulator where you can blow away your worries with satisfying leaf physics. Whether solo or with a crew of fellow groundskeepers, fire up your leaf blower and blow away every leaf in sight. Can you find peace in the clutter of leaves?

Title: Snowman Mo
ShortDescription: One little snowman's adventure of a lifetime. Embark on a grand journey in this heartwarming single-player adventure game.

Title: Razsoul Game
ShortDescription: Razsoul: a side-scrolling action platformer with heroic combat. Players jump, double jump, fly, shoot fireballs, dodge projectiles, navigate obstacles, and battle bosses. Its appeal lies in fast-paced gameplay, strategic power-ups, and escalating difficulty, testing reflexes and skill.

Title: 我的高冷女友 MY COLD GIRLFRIEND
ShortDescription: What's It Like to Have a Girlfriend with a Hidden Side? 💙A romantic comedy visual novel set in a modern campus, where a dare leads to an unexpected relationship with a cold beauty—and a sweet, chaotic cohabitation begins.

Title: Tingus Goose
ShortDescription: Tingus Goose is a delightfully absurd idle game where you plant seeds in patients, bounce babies for profit, and ascend through surreal worlds toward riches.

Title: Versus
ShortDescription: Versus is an action-packed game combining 2.5D and 3D mechanics. Play as Zed on a mission to the enigmatic island of Isolux, battling fierce enemies and unraveling mysteries that only raise more questions. With unique levels, intense combat, and epic bosses, uncover the secrets lurking in Isolux.

Title: Simogo Legacy Collection
ShortDescription: From cute arcade novelties to innovative text-based thrillers and acclaimed fourth wall-breaking stories, Simogo Legacy Collection is an eclectic celebration of Simogo's past, featuring faithful renditions of seven games released on mobile platforms between 2010 and 2015.

Title: Animal Run Relay
ShortDescription: A simulation & action race game where you race animals! Play with over 40 different animals!

Title: Type Drivers
ShortDescription: Your typing speed is your horsepower! Compete online or solo, earn money, unlock cars with faster typing skill requirements, and customize your ride.

Title: Dark Ride: The Feline Fix
ShortDescription: The Feline Fix is the first cozy adventure in the Dark Ride universe. Step into a magical potion shop tucked within the park and help reverse a curious curse that has turned an entire village into cats! It’s a relaxing scavenger hunt filled with charm, curiosity, and feline mischief.

Title: Hell of a Bullet
ShortDescription: Can you dodge all the bullets in this coopetitive party game? In Hell of a Bullet [Hell] you and up to 3 friends will face enemies with unique (and strange) patterns in arenas that change your whole strategy. Can you finish the arenas while scoring more than your friends?

Title: Super Drag Race 2
ShortDescription: Drag racing game with 3 different tracks, ai opponents and earn money by racing and tune your car better and faster

Title: We Want Your Head
ShortDescription: Hit… or die. Welcome to the twisted version of a classic arcade experience. In We Want Your Head, you enter a world of pixelated nightmares where disembodied heads burst out from the darkness. With every swing of your hammer, you fight for a few more seconds of peace — and for your own head.

Title: Trichramas
ShortDescription: A classic first-person puzzle game using RGB colors, jump maps, illusions, device puzzles, and time manipulation. It consists of about 70 stages. 3~4 hours play time .

Title: Space Novel: Forsaken Cargo
ShortDescription: A choice-driven sci-fi visual novel inspired by 1960s space opera. Play as Melchor — a spacer caught in an interstellar conspiracy. Shape alliances, betray rivals, and determine the fate of entire worlds..

Title: The Fox, The Forest & The Darkness
ShortDescription: Alone in the park as The Darkness rises, Zak begins his descent. The Fox, The Forest and The Darkness is a narrative based game centered on that moment in life when we begin to build our own reality. Zak is confused, scared and angry like most 14 year olds, but he's determined to make it count.

Title: Effulgence RPG
ShortDescription: Effulgence RPG is a party-based RPG set in a unique character-based world where enemies are more than just obstacles - they ARE the resource. 💀 Destroy them to forge better gear!

Title: Kingdom of Night
ShortDescription: Hunt down nightmarish demons and save the town of Miami, AZ in this 80s-themed, isometric action-RPG. With an expansive, interconnected map and open-ended quests, explore freely while unraveling the main story. Kingdom of Night is a unique blend of coming-of-age drama, cosmic horror, and true love.

Title: Mech and Tech 1
ShortDescription: Conquer. Build. Survive. A tactical strategy game on procedural hex grids - intense, deep. Plan every move: establish your base, secure supply lines, and unleash suppression fire against all who stand in your way. Research new technologies - improve your units. Play solo, co-op, or PvP.

Title: たき火と猫
ShortDescription: Campfire with Cat is a work-focus clicker game where you maintain the campfire by working in other software. Cozy sounds relax you, while the tension of the fire going out naturally drives task concentration. Gentle interactions with the cat bring comfort and focus to your work.

Title: Rising Heat
ShortDescription: Fight your way through the Rising Heat, a gladiator style space spectacle bankrolled by the Extraterrestrial Elite! Take flight with a diverse cast of pilots, ships and weapons! Choose upgrades, discover synergies and construct a build powerful enough to give yourself a fighting chance!

Title: Truck City
ShortDescription: Grow your truck fleet, build your city and design a supply chain to extract, refine and process natural resources into complex items. Manage your factories and optimize delivery logistics to prevent traffic jams. Unlock new research and turn your small mining town into an efficient industrial city.

Title: She's Leaving
ShortDescription: Put your forensic skills to work in She's Leaving, a terrifying first-person survival horror thriller where the line between hunter and hunted is razor thin. Investigate, survive, and escape before the darkness consumes you.

Title: SLEEP AWAKE
ShortDescription: In the last known city on Earth, people are disappearing in their sleep. Those who remain exist in a crisis of reckless experiments to keep awake. From Cory Davis (Spec Ops: The Line) and Robin Finck (Nine Inch Nails), SLEEP AWAKE blurs the boundaries between reality and imagination.

Title: Scrabdackle
ShortDescription: The magical misadventure of a novice wizard thrown (literally) into the unfamiliar world outside. Go on a sprawling hand-drawn adventure with spells to study, bosses to best, and a huge handcrafted world to traverse on the long journey home.

Title: Nebula Cleanup Crew
ShortDescription: Nebula Cleanup Crew is a short top down action roguelite shooter with a focus on hot and cold weaponry. Rescue your crew members as you blast enemies and bosses away with super heated and chilled weapons — freeze foes, overheat them and unleash powerful supertemp special attacks!

Title: Fangs to Fields
ShortDescription: A relaxing idle-farming game you can play on the edge of your desktop screen. Grow and harvest dozens of different crops while working, browsing or resting.

Title: Chamberlore
ShortDescription: Join the learning process of an artificial intelligence. A mysterious experiment awaits, where two people are sent to help it evolve.

Title: Clankers!
ShortDescription: Clankers! is a short incremental robot killing game. Kill Clankers, gather money and spend it on weapons and upgrades to stop Clankers from stealing our jobs!

Title: SlimeBattle
ShortDescription: In the game, players will play as a slime and, by defeating swarms of small monsters, continuously upgrade and unlock up to 6 spells and items. By allocating basic attribute points, spell points, they can create their own combat style and eventually defeat the boss and achieve their own legend.

Title: 攻城.三國.志-戰略版
ShortDescription: 以一种全新的真实视角，纵览全局，带你重回乱世三国之中，经营城池，招兵买马，率领亲自招募的武将征战沙场，和千万玩家一起，在三国真实地图上，攻城掠地，一统天下！

Title: 포포의 모험 (The Adventures of Popo)
ShortDescription: 귀여운 포포, 도담, 가넷과 함께 네 개의 탑에서 지도를 모아 부유섬으로 떠나는 동화풍 모험 RPG. 마왕을 무찌르고 요정 여왕을 구해 주세요.

Title: The Ogre King
ShortDescription: A small-scale 3D roguelike adventure about Grom, a one-eyed ogre wandering through a broken world. Simple battles, quiet stories, and moments of unexpected charm.

Title: Overkill Squad
ShortDescription: Overkill Squad is a twin-stick shooter roguelite packed with chaos, heavy metal, and explosions. Choose your fighter, shoot everything that moves, defeat epic bosses, and collect relics to craft unique builds.

Title: Wright Brothers' Mysteries
ShortDescription: Wright Brothers' Mysteries - A fun interactive multipath full motion visual novel

Title: みんなで Physical TRAIN ～チャムランド国営鉄道～
ShortDescription: Drive an exciting train using physics simulation and complete missions to develop Chamland!

Title: Wanderer's Waters
ShortDescription: Welcome to the ultimate indie fishing adventure, crafted with passion by just two dedicated developers! Dive into a vibrant pixel world teeming with unique fish, mysterious creatures, and hidden treasures. Whether you’re a casual angler or a master fisherman, there’s something for everyone!

Title: Love Too Easily 2: Summer Pocha
ShortDescription: Real-life dating simulation game "Love Too Easily 2: Summer Pocha." You lose everything in a hit-and-run accident while delivering food. To make matters worse, you're scammed by the only friend you ever trusted! You start running a Pocha (food truck) and encounter five beautiful girls....

Title: Rock and Scroll
ShortDescription: Embark on a journey where a cursed soul steers a boulder through the ages. Condemned by gods to an eternal ascent, navigate through times shrouded in mystery. Craft your path, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets hidden within the stone.

Title: Gaussian Mansion
ShortDescription: Explore a cursed hotel in this FREE rail shooter. Face off against hordes of ghosts, uncover hidden secrets, and fight for the best time in this 10-15 minute experience.

Title: Touhou Witch's Night Market
ShortDescription: Marisa has lost all her fortune in 'Kappachinko', now she must fight other residents in Gensokyo to repay the debt she owes Reimu! Collect various items and skills, build your construct strategically, then head towards powerful opponents! She may even encounter a mysterious being in the end…

Title: Cult of the Rotten Moon
ShortDescription: Worship, Recruit Sacrifice. Cult of the Rotten Moon is an idle clicker about worshipping a giant Eyeball, where the path to cosmic power is paved with your devoted followers bits. Expand your cult, unlock bizarre upgrades, and dominate the attention landscape in this darkly silly satire.

Title: The Kintsugi Cat
ShortDescription: Piece together alternating coloured shards of broken pottery into new designs, then watch as they're repaired with gold; in this Kintsugi-themed, Japanese minimalism inspired, 2.5D logic puzzle game.

Title: Winterlight - Where silence says it all
ShortDescription: Winterlight is a contemplative visual novel adventure about coming home, facing grief and learning to accept the ordinary over means of personal escape.

Title: Kaidogaku
ShortDescription: Kaidogaku is a symbolic deduction puzzle game. Decipher the positions for all symbols by make use of a list of placement rules. No progression no grinding just straight and simple fun to immerse in thought and lose the sense of time passing.

Title: Domestic Cat
ShortDescription: You take the role of a miner piloting the Domestic Cat spaceship to make as much credits as you can by mining asteroids through sectors composed of nine randomly assorted sub-sectors.

Title: Asvara
ShortDescription: Asvara is a psychological horror game about something that watches you too closely. It waits for you to slip, then moves in. It doesn’t knock. It doesn’t ask. It just wants inside… and it’s patient.

Title: Circuit Overload
ShortDescription: Survive the neon chaos of a digital arena. Upgrade, unleash, and outlast the overload.

Title: Saratoga
ShortDescription: Saratoga is a digital implementation of the Saratoga, Volume I of the Great Battles of the American Revolution wargame published by GMT Games and designed by Mark Miklos.

Title: Ticking Together
ShortDescription: Ticking Together is a 1-4 player co-op platformer set in a high-stakes cyberpunk world. Carry a bomb through deadly obstacle courses, reset its timer with a hand scan every 15 seconds, and work together to prevent a catastrophic city-wide explosion.

Title: Five Mysterious Murders - Part 2
ShortDescription: Five teenagers went to a small Louisiana town to make a movie about a famous serial killer. What could go wrong?

Title: NebuLeet
ShortDescription: Lead a paramilitary force against a growing space Cult threat. Program your units, build a fleet, trade, research, and engage in deep tactical combat in this RPG-strategy hybrid.

Title: Night Shift at the Museum
ShortDescription: Watch the cameras. Spot the anomalies. Report every irregularity. Fix systems and meet your report quota. But when strange events pull you out of the security room, the museum becomes dangerous. This is no longer a typical night shift when your reflection starts moving on its own.

Title: Beach Invasion 1915-Gallipoli
ShortDescription: Defend the shores of Gallipoli against landing forces in this WWI FPS game, as the enemy attacks you with troops, armored cars, planes, battleships and more! Use the iconic WWI weapons, prepare your defenses with mines, explosives and bonuses!

Title: The Enigma Lounge
ShortDescription: The Enigma Lounge is a hand-pixeled, point and click escape room puzzle game. It features a cozy yet mysterious vibe, and a small but tricky set of interconnected puzzles that must be solved in order to escape.

Title: ITRP _ Vacuum Bless
ShortDescription: You are hanging on a spaceship amidst the endless vacuum. You’ve got to options: either perish there, or collect yourself and find the fabled rescue shuttle.

Title: Kinetic
ShortDescription: A first-person platform game with smooth and responsive movements designed for speedrunning.

Title: Kinetic
ShortDescription: A first-person platform game with smooth and responsive movements designed for speedrunning.

Title: The shaved ice shop
ShortDescription: A cozy horror game where you run a shave ice shop. Serves customers by serving shaved ice, coffee, milkshakes...

Title: 17 MPH
ShortDescription: Make your way through unusual off-road challenges with advanced suspension physics and weirdly shaped wheels, but don't go below 17 miles per hour or you will regret it.

Title: Microlandia
ShortDescription: Microlandia, the brutally honest city builder: roads bleed budgets, traffic fires workers, rents spike, people become unhoused. A newspaper tracks your every move. Built on real world stats, not hand waving.

Title: DON'T SCREAM TOGETHER
ShortDescription: DON'T SCREAM TOGETHER is an online co-op jumpscare horror simulator where you and friends walk through a pitch-black forest with camcorders in 1993. Use proximity chat and escape the forest. But if anyone screams or speaks too loudly, the game restarts or the screamer returns as the hunter!

Title: Days Of Haze
ShortDescription: Incredibly unique loot and puzzle filled action RPG where you affect the climate. Loot, survive, craft, breed wildlife, defeat bosses, and equip gear. Every enemy killed, tree planted, every seed sown and every quest will dynamically affect how the climate system evolves and number of diseases.

Title: The Virtual Buddy
ShortDescription: A cute virtual buddy that lives on your desktop! Take care of them, play games, and meet their needs. The Virtual Buddy brings life and fun to your screen!

Title: The Vessel
ShortDescription: A short, experimental horror experience with bleak and unsettling atmosphere.

Title: Обо: Шоу Теней
ShortDescription: Байкал зовёт. Прошлое возвращается в форме теней, и Андрей должен решить - играть по чужим правилам или переписать сценарий судьбы.

Title: Machine TakeOver
ShortDescription: A brutal single-player top-down survival game about looting, hiding, and outsmarting relentless Machines in a decaying city where humanity is already over.

Title: Claviator
ShortDescription: A rhythm adventure game with over 70 songs and 32 story-driven missions. Explore 3D worlds and play solo, in co-op, or in competitive PvP modes.

Title: UniqKiller: Urban Shooter
ShortDescription: UniqKiller is an intense F2P topdown tactical shooter, PvP, with automatic shooting. Combine different types of bodies, classes, skills, weapons, skins, to create unique heroes, both in appearance and gameplay, for battles in urban environments.

Title: Syringebound
ShortDescription: Syringebound is fast-paced, FPS game with retro aesthetics of PS1. Fight against horde of the undead, inject syringes to make yourself more powerful, buy weapons and try to survive as long as possible.

Title: Terria Tactics
ShortDescription: An indie-developed retro turn-base strategy game. It delivers the Fast-Paced-Strategy-Game experience. Grow your cities and troops. Recruit and manage your warriors to lead the troops to siege opponents' cities. Ultimately your goal is to conquer the whole land of Terria!

Title: Fantasy Idle Dungeon
ShortDescription: In Fantasy Idle Dungeon, hatch and capture rare Jenin, awaken their legendary skills and talents, and experience the joy of leveling up, evolving, and fusing them. Freely customize your gear, assemble an unbeatable adventure team, and claim glorious victories with effortless idle gameplay!

Title: Your Another Wife
ShortDescription: Think you've had your fill of virtual waifu? It's Okay, step into the world of Your Other Waifu... She's developed a passion for dress-up and is waiting for you to join her in some delightful little games!

Title: LET IT DIE: INFERNO
ShortDescription: Hell Gate tore open the earth! Deep within its chaotic depths, where time and space warp, lies the "Eye of the Reaper"—a treasure granting world-ruling power. You are an immortal Raider. Descend into the abyss, conquer the Reaper's challenge, and seize your future from the bottom of Hell!

Title: Show Guts
ShortDescription: An omochi that flies. Grapple, stretch, and soar through the New Year sky. Fall, flatten, and rise again — because that’s what omochi does.

Title: Pirates Outlaws 2: Heritage
ShortDescription: Pirates Outlaws 2 is a swashbuckling roguelike deckbuilder. Collect & fuse cards, gather powerful relics and adapt your strategy during each run. Become a reputed pirate, loot the Sea Masters, challenge giant creatures and triumph in the great Arena!

Title: Charoite into the Deep
ShortDescription: This is an action RPG in which Charois, a little witch, goes underground with her golem. Using skills such as “dowsing” and items found in the game, players can safely reach the deepest part of the basement by avoiding traps and threats from powerful enemies.

Title: Toy Smash Kaboom!
ShortDescription: Toy mayhem unleashed! Arrange, combine, and craft the wildest toy army inside your desk, then crash into chaotic cartoon brawls across the tabletop!

Title: Christmas Yarn 4: Blessing Star
ShortDescription: Unravel a Christmas mystery in Christmas Yarn 4. The town's Blessing Star is missing, and a magical thread of yarn is your only clue. Solve match-3 puzzles, discover family secrets, and expose a conspiracy. Can you find the star and save the holiday?

Title: Dream Dazia
ShortDescription: Dream Dazia is a retro inspired 2D RPG where you explore open-world areas in Dazia's own nightmare. As Dazia - you solve puzzles, explore ways to level up, conquer any of the elemental temples in any order. Experience the turn-based combat, hidden secrets, custom bosses, exciting music and more!

Title: SQUARE PILL ESCAPE !!
ShortDescription: SQUARE PILL ESCAPE !! is a challenging 3D and 2D Platformer / Puzzle game, with physics-based moves. Skills, thinking, coop, exploration, action !

Title: Night Swarm
ShortDescription: Claim your throne as Vampire Lord in this survivor-like. Each run is another step on your journey with new followers, quests and skills to unlock. The night is yours to conquer.

Title: Psycho-Kin
ShortDescription: Psycho-Kin is a uber-stylized, top-down tactical shooter set in an alternate-history Cold War. Swap between two linked characters to outwit enemies in tense, strategic combat, while unravelling a deep, psychological story of espionage, trauma, and redemption.

Title: Treasure Drop
ShortDescription: Dive into treasure filled depths! Merge coins and gems, keep them in the dome, and build the ultimate fortune. Use powerful abilities, climb the leaderboards, play solo or in co-op, and enjoy the underwater aesthetic!

Title: Raptor Evolution
ShortDescription: Smash through environments, gather resources, and hunt grotesque human-mutants to evolve and grow stronger. Use what you collect to rebuild bridges, restore paths and push deeper into a world filled with danger and mystery.

Title: Geki Yaba Runner
ShortDescription: Turn into a raging force of destruction or a super speedy gnome to overcome Geki Yaba's ultimate challenge. Do you have what it takes to save the princess in peril?

Title: Fight For America
ShortDescription: Gear up, soldier - it’s time to reclaim freedom! Deploy turrets, adapt your tactics, and crush endless waves of enemies and bosses as you fight to liberate America, state by state.

Title: Bang Bang Tank
ShortDescription: Bang Bang Tank is a physics-based roguelike. Lead your tank battalion into explosive battles against the Evil Onioner’s invading army. Choose skilled drivers, craft unexpected winning strategies, upgrade your sciences, and deploy troops tactically to crush your enemies!

Title: Game Dev Life
ShortDescription: Build your own game development studio from scratch, create and release games, unlock new tools and platforms, and grow from solo dev to successful company in this lighthearted game dev tycoon sim.

Title: PROTECT GLOOBI
ShortDescription: Protect Gloobi is a strategic, space-themed FPS with a weird and offbeat vibe, where you split your focus between shredding your foes to pieces and replenishing your ammo by playing the game on your phone, during your challenging battles across the galaxy!

Title: Northbound
ShortDescription: To reach the North is to chase a dream, but in dreams lie both peril and truth. Do you have what it takes, little padawan?

Title: FrogCore
ShortDescription: The frog’s legs are frozen, and every step is a challenge! FrogCore is a tough pixel 2D precision platformer where slippery physics are your greatest enemy. Prove you can handle it… though we’re pretty sure you won’t.

Title: The Ultimate BezzerQuizzer
ShortDescription: A trivia game blending general knowledge with action-packed events. Play it with friends or by yourself and let the silly characters roam around the board in pursuit of Victory.

Title: Eufloria Classic
ShortDescription: Eufloria Classic brings back the original Strategy charms of the long-unavailable indie classic, updated for a new age with tons of new content and features, including extreme moddability. Old school intergalactic floral warfare is BACK!

Title: House of the Golden Mask
ShortDescription: Awaken your magic and break an ancient curse at a secret school of sorcery! What mysteries will you uncover at this crossroads between realms? A text-based fantasy novel, 280,000 words and hundreds of choices, without graphics or sound effects.

Title: Cloudheim
ShortDescription: Ragnarok shattered the world, and the gods have chosen you to shape the next one. Cloudheim is a 1-4 player action adventure that blends crafting with chaotic physics-based combat. Awaken forgotten deities, drive back corruption, and upgrade your shop in the sky to bring harmony to a broken realm.

Title: ROUTINE
ShortDescription: ROUTINE is a First Person Sci-Fi Horror set on an abandoned lunar base designed around an 80s vision of the future. Explore and investigate your surroundings as you survive against unknown threats.

Title: DETECTIVE - Rainy night
ShortDescription: Detective Rainy Night is a narrative adventure with elements of deduction. Violent crimes, mature stories, and a touch of psychological horror await you at the Motel Holiday. Grab a pencil and paper because solving this case won’t be easy.

Title: Get Mazed
ShortDescription: GET MAZED is a 3D asymmetrical multiplayer game pitting survivors against opponents in procedurally generated mazes. Work together, obstruct your adversaries, and solve puzzles to escape before time runs out.

Title: The Curse We Made
ShortDescription: A short ride into a cursed town — a hand-drawn puzzle adventure where ghouls and monsters haunt every corner, and solving puzzles slowly brings life back to the world and uncovers the truth.

Title: Disturbulence
ShortDescription: Aboard Skyway Airlines above the Bermuda Triangle, the cabin is caught in an endless loop. Each time you walk the aisle, reality changes—small details twisting into something deeply wrong. Spot every disturbance. Survive ten perfect loops. Break the cycle… or vanish into the turbulence forever.

Title: FEROCIOUS
ShortDescription: Immerse yourself in a survival FPS adventure. Stranded on a dangerous island, face mercenaries, dinosaurs, and a vibrant yet hostile ecosystem. Explore breathtaking environments and survive the onslaught of intense, fast-paced encounters.

Title: Log Away
ShortDescription: Build a cozy cabin that feels like home. Travel to peaceful Retreats in changing seasons and weather, decorate at your own pace, and collect Keepsakes with gentle backstories. No grind. No pressure. Just nature, animals, and time to breathe.

Title: Ultimate Girlfriend Experience
ShortDescription: Create and customize your own girlfriend character and let her stay on your computer while chilling, watching movies, playing or even working.

Title: Spin to Survive
ShortDescription: Rougelite + Russian Roulette, but using a more powerful cannon. Survive and take all the prizes!

Title: Big Band Survivors
ShortDescription: Build your band, unlock powerful relics, and slay hordes in sync with the beat. Big Band Survivors is a rhythm-based roguelite that combines the visceral gameplay of the Survivors-like genre with musically interwoven game mechanics.

Title: Latin Shadows - The Visitor
ShortDescription: After sharing laughter and conversations at a gathering, the calm begins to fade when you realize something is watching you. The night unfolds into a chilling tale of horror where every choice shapes your fate. A haunting horror experience that brings back the atmosphere of timeless classics.

Title: Foobar Zero
ShortDescription: Foobar Zero is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter game, with anime characters. Customize your characters with various outfits, create your own loadout with futuristic guns and swords, and dominate your enemies with superior movement!

Title: Blood and Dust
ShortDescription: A Western open-world story of redemption. Play as Henry Bridger, a former outlaw rebuilding his life in Goldfield. Hunt, work, explore, and forge bonds as you shape your destiny across a living, dynamic frontier.

Title: The Shadowed Rune
ShortDescription: The Shadowed Rune is a challenging action roguelike where you can create millions of spell combinations to overcome a tower of dangers. Play solo or in co-op and uncover the truth hidden behind the shadows.

Title: Echoes of Elysium
ShortDescription: Survive the skies in Echoes of Elysium, a co-op airship survival RPG. Build and customize your floating fortress, gather resources, and explore a vast procedural clockwork world with up to 6 friends. Battle land and skyborne threats while uncovering mysteries in a paradise on the brink.

Title: Deadly Delivery
ShortDescription: An online VR co-op horror game about delivering parcels into haunted mines. Avoid monsters, drop off packages, and pray you reach the quota! Team up with up to 3 other delivery goblins, survive your shift and pay back your student loans.

Title: MineMogul
ShortDescription: Design and build a factory deep underground in this physics-based automation sandbox. Mine resources, buy machines and master the chaos as you become the ultimate Mine Mogul!

Title: Hive and Seek
ShortDescription: Hive and Seek is a side-scrolling strategy base-building game where you clear space stations infested with monsters. By rallying robots and clearing rooms from all kinds of danger, you will be able to destroy hives and recapture the station piece by piece.

Title: Baseless
ShortDescription: Baseless is a challenging planet-jumping shooter where shooting = movement! Blast from planet to planet with 360° gravity, creatively demolishing every enemy in your path. Fire powerful weapons, rescue cute friends, and discover a galaxy worth fighting for!

Title: Transience
ShortDescription: Become an Accountant - a hired mercenary who keeps the books balanced by any means necessary. This time though, you are the intended target. Take a journey through New Houston in the year 2056 and follow one man's tale of revenge as he escapes Transience.

Title: Farm To Defend
ShortDescription: The Yokis, the eternal hourglass, must be defended at all costs against hordes of enemies. You’ll need to produce resources to build defenses and complete trials and challenges to grow stronger.

Title: Blood: Refreshed Supply™
ShortDescription: Things are about to get… bloody! Soak up 42 pulse-pounding levels dripping with Lovecraftian atmosphere as you battle your way through armies of sycophantic cultists, zombies, gargoyles, hell hounds, and other insatiable horrors, in your quest to defeat the loathsome Tchernobog.

Title: Stack Prootocol
ShortDescription: A puzzle-platformer with gravity-defying, block-stacking action. Play as Meep, a RAM-loving USB-mouse, on a quest in cyberspace to repair a broken toaster. Create new paths and jump to your goal—but watch out for the digital void!

Title: Knights In A Different SpaceTime
ShortDescription: A Knight with a gun. Something's happened to time. Deadly robots invading. A twin-stick, action, top down shooter, with in depth gun customization, special abilities, and classic swords. Shoot your way through linear levels and secrets, and develop the ultimate guns and futuristic weapons.

Title: MURAYAKI villain
ShortDescription: The very domination! Be the demon king who conquers the world! "MURAYAKI VILLAIN"a village-burning, female-oriented, ♀ > ♂ Demon King Army raising dating sim

Title: Three Kingdom - Zhang Jiao Revival
ShortDescription: Three Kingdom - Zhang Jue Revival is a real time RPG roguelite. Battle alone or recruit up to 10 comrade to fight along side in real time combat. Specialize in 1 class or learn all 6, wide range of equipment to create your own build. Powerful yet simple statistic system to spice up game play.

Title: Classroom 0
ShortDescription: You are stuck in the infinite floors of an eerie Indian school, keep moving, identify every anomaly you see, and reach the 0th floor to finally escape the loop in this Exit-8 style game.

Title: Gluon
ShortDescription: Gluon is a neon-soaked infinite platformer where you dash, build, and survive in a world collapsing into a black hole. Create and share maps, master momentum, slow time, and challenge friends in fast, physics-defying runs.

Title: Pigslaughter
ShortDescription: Pigslaughter is a top-down shooter where you play as a Sigma Force special agent, trying to save human souls from Pig Primes. Explore a sprawling modern city, wield a variety of weapons, eliminate your enemies, and reclaim the stolen capital.

Title: Parnitha: Patient 66
ShortDescription: A haunted house, whispers from the past, and a truth you were never meant to uncover. Psychological horror inspired by real locations in Greece.

Title: Tale of android after the Apocalypse
ShortDescription: Niluas, an android who suddenly activated 276 years after the extinction of humanity. With her AI, Naive, she seeks lost memories, her activation's mystery, and humanity's extinction's cause. Facing enigmatic foes and hostile androids, she quests for truth about her existence and the desolate world.

Title: SU42: Hired Gun
ShortDescription: Save the planet SU-42 and join the fight! 🚀🔥 SU42: HIRED GUN is a fast-paced 2D shooter inspired by 80s/90s games! Choose two out of eight mercenaries and switch between them in battle. Enjoy hand-painted graphics, giant robots, a synth-wave soundtrack, explosions, and lasers!

Title: Devil in my head
ShortDescription: A short indie horror game where you confront pure evil. Can you resist it, if that's even possible?

Title: Ludo XXL 2
ShortDescription: Prepare to keep (or lose) your temper online! This beloved game classic offers even more game options: “Ludo XXL 2” brings the crazy dice-rolling fun straight to your living room – or, with the latest online multiplayer mode, even to Grandma and Grandpa on the other side of the world.

Title: Drop: Save the Forest
ShortDescription: In Drop: Save the Forest, use the power of water to solve environmental puzzles, extinguish wildfires, and save biomes inspired by the Dolomites. 🏔️ Combine elements like wind, fire, and plants in a lively pixel art adventure. 💧🌱🔥

Title: Dungeon Run
ShortDescription: Race through 100 floors, collect all the keys, and compete for glory!

Title: The You Quiz
ShortDescription: The You Quiz is a multiplayer game where the questions are about you! Be the King and judge your friends' answers about yourself. Or be a Courtier, guess their quirks, tastes, and dreams. Win favor, climb the ranks, become the new King. 3-8 players, online or local.

Title: Elezion
ShortDescription: Elezion is a visual novel about memory, war, and human connection, told across several intertwined timelines. Retro pixel art and original music frame a story where every choice explores what it means to exist.

Title: 月华辉映之刻
ShortDescription: ——这是由阴阳两面的夹缝中，诞生的深刻羁绊。世人只言开封繁华，歌舞升平，却难以看到那，被隐藏起来的黑暗背面。粉饰的美好，残酷的真相。生者的思念，亡者的祝福。所以，你要止步当前，还是深究一切？

Title: Randal's Tuesday
ShortDescription: A classic point and click adventure which takes place in a University and the prequel to Randal's Monday.

Title: Hotdog Hazards
ShortDescription: Hotdog Hazards puts you in Tony's shoes, a highly trained grill master and undercover agent for the Galactic Tasteforce. Save the world by serving hot dogs to alien tourists, or fight for survival one hot dog at a time in challenge mode. Wishlist now to prepare for the grill of a lifetime.

Title: Almora Darkosen
ShortDescription: Welcome to the world of Almora Darkosen RPG, a classic retro-style hack and slash game! Fight, craft items, explore big island and discover all secrets! The game was passionately created by a single developer!

Title: Nuclecard
ShortDescription: Survive the nuclear post-apocalyptic world. Build, craft, hunt, and fight through brutal seasons and deadly encounters. Hand-drawn illustrations and original soundtrack, deep progression, and 10 mini-games. Every decision matters.

Title: Hidden Cats vs Zombies 3
ShortDescription: Hidden Cats VS Zombies is a hidden object game – the player's task is to find cats hidden on the map and eliminate the zombies. The game is designed in a zombie apocalypse style, but with a touch of humor.

Title: Agreeee
ShortDescription: Can you 'play' this game!? To play the thrilling action game, you must agree to all 12 terms and conditions.

Title: Creature Menace: The Ultimate Nightmare
ShortDescription: Battle against hordes of violent creatures in this 2D arcade-shooter. Utilize your vast arsenal of weapons to survive across the 8 maps, level up using the unique class and perk system, beat your previous high scores as you become stronger. Endure the peril alone, or with up to 3 other friends.

Title: Quin Excluder
ShortDescription: A retro arcade-style, 2D vertical scrolling shooter Pixel art inspired by 16-bit consoles and arcade games from the '80s and '90s Focus on the exhilarating "aim, shoot, kill" feel of the original shooter game. Receive communications from Controller Luna as you progress through each stage's story

Title: I commissioned some pigeons 4
ShortDescription: I paid more artists to hide pigeons and bread in 15 more pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

Title: ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL
ShortDescription: Explore a frozen limbo in this top-down survival adventure. Collect resources, craft tools, and uncover a story of memory and redemption as you search for escape from the Hollow.

Title: Nightmare Returner
ShortDescription: Introducing the game Nightmare Returner! Nightmare Returner is a roguelite game. Let me explain the game's background story. The main character is a former game developer who, in order to overcome the trauma caused by the stress of a job he quit, dreams of fighting monsters in the dark every night.

Title: Backrooms: Missing Persons
ShortDescription: Many have vanished without a trace, swallowed by the endless halls of the Backrooms. Now it’s your turn to step inside. Wander through unsettling liminal spaces, guided only by the constant hum of fluorescent lights. Are you the next to disappear?

Title: Inotia 4
ShortDescription: The grand adventure of Kiyan, assassin of the Dark Clan, and Yusha, saint of light, begins across the vast continent of Inotia. Experience an emotional story and thrilling, action-packed combat!

Title: Mad Bang Bang
ShortDescription: YOUR VOICE MATTERS! Throw away your mouse and keyboard! In the world of Mad Bang Bang, you control magic with your voice. It’s the world’s first game powered entirely by vocal commands. Shout “Bang! Bang! Bang!” and give your opponent hell!

Title: Hardcore Circus
ShortDescription: Hardcore Circus is a punishment-based platformer inspired by precision-platformers and Foddian classics. It is designed for players who love the satisfaction of mastering the movement and the pain of repeating the same section 100s of times.

Title: The Black Knight Chronicles - The Quest Beyond Destiny
ShortDescription: A retro-inspired jRPG with side-view turn-based combat, puzzle-rich dungeons, and meaningful side quests. Explore a vast world, recruit allies, and uncover secrets in an epic adventure nearly twice as large as before.

Title: Depthbound Descent
ShortDescription: Roguelike meets JRPG: You and your party challenge the Cavern of Trials—collect skills, adapt your build, and reach the end boss to escape. Built with the Steam Deck in mind, easy to pick up, hard to master.

Title: Jurassic Wrap
ShortDescription: Rescue baby dino eggs in a family-friendly adventure made by a father & son duo. In Jurassic Wrap, your goal is simple: save the baby dino eggs and make it safely to the exit portal. Along the way you’ll leap, dodge, and use clever screen-wrapping mechanics to outsmart threats through each level.

Title: Citizen Pain
ShortDescription: Citizen Pain is a first-person dark fantasy action game. Play as Catherina, warrior princess of the Moges Empire, who gains the supernatural force known as Pain and leads the fight against the Undead King. Classic single-player combat meets modern visuals in this skill-based indie experience.

Title: Catching Spirits
ShortDescription: Hunt your prey, escape your predator - the 1v1v1 party brawler. Pick from 12 shamans with unique abilities and special attacks. Three forces, one fight - who will prevail? 🌱💦🔥

Title: PolyLumina
ShortDescription: A colorful rhythm simulation game where you compose polyrhythmic chord progressions and watch them come alive through glowing, reactive visuals.

Title: It's Hard To Be A Support
ShortDescription: It's Hard To Be A Support is a captivating 2D action game. Your sacred mission is to guide a team of four brave warriors through treacherous lands, using your celestial powers to heal their wounds, enhance their abilities, and purge sinister curses that threaten their survival

Title: Steam & Steel Railway Tycoon
ShortDescription: Steam & Steel — Railway Tycoon puts you at the helm of a dieselpunk railway empire. Manage stations, locomotives, and resources, then dive into real-time simulation with dynamic maps, evolving fleets, and strategic decisions that shape your network’s rise.

Title: Forgot
ShortDescription: You are trapped at home in an endless loop. Remember your surroundings and watch out for anomalies, if you ever want to leave.

Title: Marble Odyssey: Sandbox
ShortDescription: On a wooden table drifting through space, build little contraptions just to see what happens. Release the marbles and enjoy the calm rhythm of their flow. A warm, curious, and delightful sandbox experience.

Title: HELL OF FEAR: Mind Breach
ShortDescription: Step into the boots of Major Axel Vex in this survival horror descent into deep space. You embark on a mission to investigate a distress signal coming from Cengona Base. What starts off as a simple mission quickly turns into a terrifying, action-packed fight for survival.

Title: ColdSide: Retro Edition
ShortDescription: ColdSide: Retro Edition is a reimagined version of the 2020 indie horror game, recreated in the style of classic retro titles. You once again find yourself in an abandoned bunker where research on anomalous phenomena is underway

Title: excellent
ShortDescription: excellent is a puzzle game based on data analysis, where data is stored into blocks. Arrange the data, create new blocks and ranges, and discover how the function blocks work and interact with the data in order to solve the puzzles.

Title: The Mnemograph
ShortDescription: The Mnemograph is a turn-based strategy and card game with roguelike elements. Upgrade your printing plant, strengthen your deck, and become the most powerful newspaper tycoon in this corrupt city!

Title: The Case of the Worst Day Ever
ShortDescription: It was supposed to be a party, but nobody's celebrating! Peek into the lives of each unfortunate family member, form your own conclusions, and solve this silly yet challenging deduction mystery.

Title: Dungeon Rampage
ShortDescription: Battle your way to victory in this 1-4 player co-op hack-n-slash dungeon crawler. Play as a dynamic cast of heroes slicing their way through dungeons, earning weapons and loot. Rampage past a gauntlet of enemies and destruction to end the evil Lord Dinglepus' reign!

Title: Screaming In The Basement (2025)
ShortDescription: P.T. inspired, an investigative reporter called Mike investigates a tragic family murder. Strange things from 1991 occur in an apartment said to be home to restless souls, an evil rooted in darkness, a realistic and immersive horror atmosphere.

Title: Away From Home
ShortDescription: A Rhythm based RPG experience. Providing detailed pixel art and expressive animation. Experience a fun world with lots of colorful characters. Come and disrupt their peace!

Title: Delivery Simulator
ShortDescription: Manage your own delivery business in a bustling city. Drive, deliver, upgrade your warehouse, and navigate traffic in this detailed and immersive courier simulator. Coming Soon – Add to Wishlist on Steam

Title: Cloak And Coin
ShortDescription: Cloak And Coin offers 1-4 players the chaotic thrill of being thieves, just not particularly graceful ones. With a limited number of days to plan, finance and execute the greatest heist Marfit has ever seen.

Title: Kenoma: Action Without Action
ShortDescription: Answer the question of mortality in this sidescroller inspired by the adventures of old. Wander the depths of two parallel worlds. Confer with gods, locals, and other travelers. Solve problems through intuition and a collection of odd trinkets. Choose: death, or eternal life?

Title: Neko no Yume
ShortDescription: Fulfilling your dream is just the beginning… but what if your dreams held a mystery? Join Konekomaru in this dating VN, where romance, comedy, and a hidden enigma intertwine. Meet different girls, make choices, and uncover the meaning of his dreams. Love, destiny, or something more?

Title: Everfall: Idle Dungeon RPG
ShortDescription: Battle epic bosses, loot powerful gear, find loyal pets, and forge your build through skill trees, keystones, and runes in an ever-evolving endgame.

Title: Major Milkers on Double Booty Duty
ShortDescription: All is fair in love and war! Seduce the enemy general with your unparalleled cock so she can turn the tide of this epic struggle and dethrone the Princess. Once peace has been restored to the realm you’ll be pulling double booty duty keeping both ladies in line!

Title: Megalocephalo
ShortDescription: A side-scrolling 2.5D run-and-gun platformer featuring mechanically inclined sea creatures. Help Pancake on his quest to stop the megalomaniacal Dr. Squid from spreading his ruthless influence!

Title: JRoguePG
ShortDescription: A Roguelike JRPG. Fight progressively harder battles, unlock classes, engage with an deep and finely-balanced battle system, explore 25 unique biomes, and slowly earn power and knowledge. How many generations of heroes will you sacrifice to rid the world of evil? Perfect for the Steam Deck!

Title: How to create a witch
ShortDescription: Claudia, a young girl who once saved the Demon Continent as a powerful mage, now sets out on a new journey. She infiltrates a mysterious cult in search of her long-lost younger sister, from whom she was separated in childhood. Will Claudia be able to find her sister safely?

Title: Kuiper Roulette
ShortDescription: Kuiper Roulette is a strategic turn-based card game with fun and cute space themes ranging from cool card designs to silly space animations. Your objective is to be last one standing, using items, boosting items, stealing items, and trading items with the diverse mechanics given to you.

Title: VHS Velocity Retro Horizon
ShortDescription: Drive an '80s dream down an endless neon highway. Your playlist is the main passenger. A powerful synthwave soundtrack is the fuel and essence of this trip. Turn it up and lose yourself in the road.

Title: 肉鸽麻将
ShortDescription: A mahjong game similar to the clown card game, where players must win within the specified number of draws and achieve the required score for each level to progress. Levels are set with various restrictions, and players can learn skills to pass through the various levels set by the game.

Title: Bad Goys
ShortDescription: Bad Goys is a fast-paced political parody where you play greedy elite caricatures racing to collect coins before time runs out. Featuring 75 levels, 3 maps, trinkets to collect, star rankings, character customisation, and no forced ads.

Title: treasure of Y
ShortDescription: 《Treasure of Y》是一款冒险主题的回合制 RPG，玩家将在地图中探索遗迹与未知区域，通过移动、收集与解谜推进故事，并在遭遇敌人时进行策略性的回合制战斗。玩家需要选择技能、制定行动顺序并合理分配资源来战胜不同类型的敌人，同时通过装备与遗物构建适合自己的战斗风格。游戏的主要吸引力在于探索带来的新发现、回合制战斗的策略深度，以及收集秘宝碎片时逐渐呈现的神秘世界背景。

Title: Foreign Orc
ShortDescription: Learn a language while whacking rogues in a foreign land! Read, decide, and strike before time runs out. Improve your vocabulary through gameplay instead of flashcards and choose between multiple languages and categories.

Title: Robot Space Frenzy
ShortDescription: All the robots on Space Station 451 have gone berserk! Only one human is left alive! Can she survive the onslaught and escape? Blast your way through homicidal robots in this groovy throwback retro FPS!

Title: Ready-Player-Go!
ShortDescription: The city is gone, the roads are empty. The gold is still out there. Drive, search, remember. Embark in a realistic treasure hunt through a vast open landscape where your visual memory is your only map. Your journey doesn't end when the credits roll, it's only just begun.

Title: Universe Exploration
ShortDescription: A text-based space idle strategy game where you build machines, expand your territory, and command interstellar fleets on a journey from the Solar System to the far stars

Title: Arena : Run And Hit
ShortDescription: A 10-player rooftop battle. Enjoy the simple game of "Arena: Run & Hit," where you simply hit and run away. The last player standing among the 10 players wins. You can battle on the rooftops with friends through the group, or compete with others through the competition to determine rankings.

Title: Neon Fantasy: Fairies
ShortDescription: Neon Fantasy: Fairies is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

Title: Crafty Racer
ShortDescription: Race with your own vehicles and characters, in your own tracks! Craft your traps, secret shortcuts, huge jumps and wacky contraptions! Compete against AI or challenge your friends in local multiplayer!

Title: Unboxathon
ShortDescription: Unboxathon is a cute content-packed incremental game about opening mystery boxes. Find rare items, upgrade your skills, and unlock new boxes & features! Collect shiny items, pop bubble wrap, and materialize artifacts out of thin air. Can you find your lost childhood plush?

Title: Angeline Era
ShortDescription: Every level is hidden in plain sight in this nonlinear 3D Action-Adventure game! Travel a vast country's unmarked overworld in search of the next challenging fight, humorous encounter, or mysterious landscape. YOU decide what you discover next in this world of Fae, Humans and Angels!

Title: Time and Space Legacy
ShortDescription: Time and Space Legacy is a top-view puzzle game where you design and build your own space stations. Manage scarce resources, lay out buildings accordingly, and use advanced time-traveling technologies to save the future of humankind !

Title: Before They Catch Us
ShortDescription: A dark text-based RPG set in a world gripped by a restless race for survival against a merciless mushroom Forest. As a prophet’s apprentice, guide your clan along the knife-edge between life and oblivion. Decipher misty visions, make critical decisions, and do whatever it takes to survive.

Title: 아테네 학원 ~사랑과 진리의 변증법적 검증~
ShortDescription: The world is in a Great Age of Academia, with philosophy in particular garnering immense attention. This is the visual novel, Academy of Athens, a philosophical brain battle. What exactly happens at the Academy of Athens, a gathering place for geniuses...?

Title: Pro Stone Curling
ShortDescription: Pro Stone Curling is the best curling game simulation.

Title: Cat Named Mojave
ShortDescription: Stranded in the desert, your only hope of escaping rests in a strange Catman. His one request: hunt down surreal creatures, skin them, and chop them up so he can keep them as trophies.

Title: Cognitive Displacement
ShortDescription: Cognitive Displacement is a simple game about a manager operating a research facility.

Title: My fair damnation
ShortDescription: You are a nurse trapped in a decaying hospital, surrounded by grotesque patients you must care for… for your own sake. Step into this psychological horror, uncover the reason for your punishment, and survive the darkness born from within yourself. But above all… stay away from him.

Title: Yakuza 0 Director's Cut
ShortDescription: Discover the decadence and danger of 1980's Japan as you fight like hell through its neon-lit entertainment districts in the definitive edition of the action-adventure crime drama that created yakuza legends.

Title: High Fructose
ShortDescription: Ghostrunner meets Fruit Ninja in this first-person survival roguelite. Wall-run, bend time, and carve through hordes of demon fruit with unusual weapons. Kill fruit to complete recipes and unlock sweet power-ups, then spend your spoils in the shop between waves.

Title: Yondel
ShortDescription: An infinite-map pixel survival game where you explore, mine, build, and fight through layered underground worlds filled with unique mobs, ores, and bosses.

Title: Mari's Magical Deliveries
ShortDescription: A cute delivery dating sim about a witch reigniting old flames. Deliver packages & fall in love in this bite-sized otome game!

Title: Esports Team Manager
ShortDescription: Lead your own professional esports team: sign players, play drafts, secure sponsors, and battle through full seasons in this stat-driven sim.

Title: Skate Story
ShortDescription: Ollie, kickflip, and grind your way through the ash and smoke of the Underworld as you take on a seemingly impossible quest. Skate fast to destroy demons and save other tortured souls on your journey from fragile beginner to a hardened skater.

Title: Farmer’s Market Simulator
ShortDescription: Grow fresh crops, raise animals, and run your own cozy countryside market! Expand your farm, upgrade your tools, and build the ultimate farmer’s life.

Title: New Frontiers: A Pony Express Fantasy
ShortDescription: Join Eugene, a new Pony Express rider, on a journey across undiscovered lands and experiences with other guys. Follow the pioneering adventurer carrying mail across the American west in this screen-by-screen game, in which you get to make choices that ultimately affect the outcome of the game.

Title: Typing Challenge
ShortDescription: The game rule is simple. Type the words faster than they respawn.

Title: Plants in Rush
ShortDescription: Plants in rush is a multiplayer and single player game. Its fun, fast paced, and simple. You have to chose between 4 fruits throw projectiles spawn lasers turrets and more! it has 3 modes deathmatch team deathmatch and soccer!

Title: Glyph Gambit
ShortDescription: A turn-based tactical roguelite where you battle across grid-based arenas, destroy the enemy King before they destroy yours, and protect your Glyphs—lost if you fall, recoverable only by clearing the level where they dropped.

Title: 16 Cyber-Personalities: Survivors
ShortDescription: Inspired by MBTI, this is a fast-paced, top-down arena shooter roguelite where your inner world becomes the battleground. Harness the power of four elemental sprites to fend off the sinister forces lurking in your mind. No matter what your personalities are, you can conquer your darkest thoughts!

Title: Sudoku Dreams
ShortDescription: Easy on the eyes and easy to play, customizable themes and hints.

Title: The House of Stillness
ShortDescription: Hehe... It really looks delicious... This is a “Japanese-style Kawaii ghost anime horror game” where you uncover the truth behind the village's “Kamishizume Ritual.” while fleeing from an approaching sinister presence.

Title: PLAY AND LEARN: Fun Learning Games for Kids
ShortDescription: PLAY AND LEARN brings four fun and educational games for kids from preschool to 1st grade! Play exciting mini-games, practice key skills like math and reading, unlock secret characters, and watch your child learn while having a blast!

Title: Dissimilar
ShortDescription: Investigate a sprawling, maze-like castle where engaging tactical battles hide long-buried family secrets. A unique blend of mystery, turn-based combat, and exploration.

Title: Carbox
ShortDescription: Race across an ever-growing collection of tracks and challenges, unlock tons of cars, win cups, and explore user-generated maps. Build and share your own worlds and circuits with the powerful, easy-to-use World Editor, and prove your skills on our global leaderboards!

Title: Scholar Adventure: Mystery of Silence
ShortDescription: Mystery of Silence is a point-and-click adventure where William, a young writer in search of inspiration, enters an abbey shrouded in silence. What William finds within those walls is not just a story to tell, but a secret that should never be discovered.

Title: Keep the Heroes Out
ShortDescription: An asymmetric, cooperative dungeon defense game for 1-4 players where you play as the monsters protecting their hard earned treasures against invading hordes of looters (so-called heroes) trying to steal it.

Title: Legitimate Space Corp Simulator LLC - Prologue
ShortDescription: NOW HIRING: Station Manager! Run a totally-legit* space biz in Sector 7-G. Farm alien crops, refuel shady ships, and sell dangerously edible snacks. Perks: gloves, oxygen insurance**, and mild relevance. No exp needed. Apply today! *Legit status not valid in all sectors. **Terms apply.

Title: Death Howl
ShortDescription: Journey through the sorrowful spirit world in a soulslike deck builder. Craft cards and claim powerful totems to defeat the woeful spirits lurking in the mystical lands. Unravel the tale of a grieving mother in her desperate attempt to defy death and bring back her son.

Title: Gem and Tarot
ShortDescription: 《Gem and Tarot》 is a strategy game that blends match-3 puzzles with deck-building. Build your deck, upgrade your abilities, and conquer challenging stages. Unlock new gems with unique powers by meeting certain conditions, making every run unique!

Title: Outer Space Piñata
ShortDescription: A hazardous piñata floats in deep space. Blast it open with your rocket to clear safe routes for space trucks, then clean up the galaxy as you snag the candy before it disappears into the stars!

Title: Super Smiling Dungeon
ShortDescription: Welcome to Super Smiling dungeon : the tiny and retro dungeon crawler. Train yourself to always go farther and unlock new heroes. Behind the portal, each run will be different with special rooms and some procedural generation available on each floor. Can you reach the top of the dungeon ?

Title: Milano's Odd Job Collection
ShortDescription: Milano is on her own for summer vacation, and she’s ready to live her best life! Take on part-time jobs, personalize your home, or spend the day eating popcorn at the park. Experience this retro classic for the first time outside of Japan, now with modern improvements.

Title: Storm Lancers
ShortDescription: Storm Lancers is a fast-paced rogue-like, where every run means dodging death, overcoming enemies, and mastering powerful skills. The battle is on, so team up in chaotic co-op to double your chances of survival.

Title: UNBEATABLE
ShortDescription: UNBEATABLE is a rhythm adventure where music is illegal and you do crimes. Follow the story of Beat and her band on the run, in a narrative experience full of big emotions powered by arcade-flawless rhythm gameplay.

Title: Balloon Ride
ShortDescription: Balloon Ride is a game where you control the balloon and fly through avoiding all the obstacles Every obstacle you avoid will give you score Challenge yourself in getting more score

Title: Go Slimey Go!
ShortDescription: Help Slimey, our tiny slippery protagonist, visit his friends for some well deserved teatime after some thrilling platforming challenges!

Title: PancitoMerge
ShortDescription: Drop, stack, and merge colorful pan dulce into bigger, tastier treats in this cozy puzzle adventure! With charming visuals and simple gameplay, it’s a sweet celebration of Mexican baking, perfect for quick sessions and high score chases.

Title: Queen's Loyalty
ShortDescription: Unite the scattered Monster Queens and reclaim your power. Level up to enhance each Queen’s stats and skills, and hold your enemies accountable for breaking the peace accord.

Title: Anxiety Puppy
ShortDescription: Anxiety Puppy is a 2D interactive narrative game that focuses on anxiety. In the game, anxiety is personified as a little puppy. Players will explore its story and try to coexist with it. Go find its traces and give it a hug.

Title: Deepstone Rift
ShortDescription: Fight big battles in the mines, get to mining and collecting gold and minerals. build and upgrade your towers, power up with treasure chests. Defend your base from looting goblins! using variety of weapons and tower, from RPG, ak47, canons towers, to sawblade towers and more!

Title: Liege of the Labyrinth
ShortDescription: Can you guide your party through all 20 floors of The Labyrinth and defeat its Liege in this turn-based roguelike RPG? As their Guardian, the party will be counting on your to plan ahead and work around unexpected encounters.

Title: Christmas Supermarket Simulator
ShortDescription: Run your own Christmas supermarket, serve customers, stock products, and enjoy a warm, festive holiday experience.

Title: VELASTER
ShortDescription: VELASTER is a gruesome 3D side-scrolling action combat game set in the Middle-earth called Malum. You will find yourself growing in battles against various monsters and bosses. Take revenge that remains in your fading memories.

Title: Castle Selbst
ShortDescription: Fight through a castle full of foes with cards and whatever weapons you can get a hand on. Face foes with an active time card based combat system, and build decks to gain the upper hand. Four towers stand a against you. May you find purpose traversing them.

Title: NeverAwake FLASHBACK
ShortDescription: A twin-stick shooter is based on the nightmare world of “NeverAwake” and has been reborn as a roguelite shooter!

Title: Last Orders
ShortDescription: Last Orders is a first-person multiplayer encapsulation of British pub culture: sink pints, sing, dance, smoke, gamble, and get in fights. Get your friends together and prepare for the night out of your life!

Title: 📷🔍 Pictective
ShortDescription: Think you're good at spotting images and solving captchas? Join Doma, a curious little cat who's just started training to become a detective! Help Doma take on picture-matching challenges to prove your skills!

Title: Drill Rift
ShortDescription: Build and manage a remote drill outpost in this turn-based strategy game. Upgrade strategic machinery and level up your dwarfs. Balance resource management, strategic upgrades, and madness. If you drill too deeply, you may awaken what should not be awakened.

Title: 死者还阳Escape from the Underworld
ShortDescription: A Chinese occult text adventure game - the player plays the role of "I", who is dying of the disease, and in a trance, is drawn to a black and white world. Here, "I" meets five other people who come here for different reasons.

Title: Meeting Places
ShortDescription: A minimalist city builder all about creating places for neighbours of different tribes to meet.

Title: Boned Again: Survivors
ShortDescription: Boned Again throws you into a brutal arena where endless hordes rise and only raw skill keeps you alive.

Title: Honrang
ShortDescription: You wake up in a lecture room. The hallway loops endlessly, and there is no exit.

Title: The End of History
ShortDescription: A Strategy RPG where you live freely in a vast medieval feudal-simulated sandbox. Listen to the requests of the citizens, trade, plunder, serve, own a territory as a noble, usurp the throne, endless wars, and betrayal. The intertwining of your and numerous NPCs' intentions creates unique stories.

Title: Cozyrama
ShortDescription: Cozyrama is a peaceful sandbox where you shape your own magical dioramas. Sculpt it, pick the right colors, decorate with hundreds of items and add cute animals. Observe a cozy world grow around you! No pressure or timers. Just relax, unwind, and let your imagination bloom!

Title: The Temple of Elemental Evil
ShortDescription: Years ago a demoness’s elemental cult ruled from a temple near Nulb until the Circle of Eight razed it. Now bandits stalk Hommlet and dark forces gather at the ruins. In this classic party‑based D&D RPG, unmask their true purpose and confront the reborn evil before chaos engulfs the land.

Title: Santa's Hitlist CEO Edition
ShortDescription: Santa's Hitlist: CEO Edition is a single-player, top-down shooter rogue-lite game where you play as Santa, avenging average workers by taking down their CEOs. Armed with a vast arsenal of weapons, you'll face off against epic bosses from the business world in your quest for justice.

Title: World Sprint
ShortDescription: Run, jump, and slide through colorful worlds in this fast-paced 3D endless runner! Unlock unique characters, helpful pets, and powerful upgrades using in-game coins. Chase achievements, climb local leaderboards, and see how far you can sprint in World Sprint!

Title: Perfect Hue Arena
ShortDescription: A casual action platformer with 6 game modes including Capture the Flag, Boss, Pixel PIckup, and Orb. There are a variety of unique items to collect and atmospheric arenas to explore.

Title: Slide! Throw! Snow Party
ShortDescription: Slide around, throw snowballs, and aim to be champion! Play solo or together—the winter party begins!

Title: Mamon King
ShortDescription: "Mamon King" is a monster-raising simulation where you aim to become the King. Battles feature simple turn-based command combat, yet each monster possesses unique skills. Combined with the SP required to activate these skills, this creates intense strategic gameplay that anyone can easily enjoy.

Title: Piggy Food Run
ShortDescription: 🎮 Piggy Food Run is a challenging casual platformer for 1 to 8 players. In this game, you play as a hungry pig that needs to race to the finish line to eat berries.

Title: Therapy Simulator
ShortDescription: Step into the chair of a therapist in Therapy Simulator! Guide your patients through emotional journeys with branching dialogue choices. Balance humor, humanity, and the chaos of therapy!

Title: The Dark Delivers
ShortDescription: Welcome to Postal Sector 7. As the Night Shift Package Inspector, your job is simple: assess parcels and reject anything not up to code. Stay alert for anomalous dangers and survive long enough to meet your quota by 6AM.

Title: Whelm
ShortDescription: Whelm is an open world, physics playground. Save animals. Tidy up beaches. Restore strange machines. Grow plants and, more importantly, your collection of hats.

Title: THE SILENT BUNKER SCREAMING ECHOES
