ShortDescription: Search a dark bunker for a missing brother. Solve puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and survive terrifying encounters in a tense, immersive world.

Title: Second Stellar
ShortDescription: Join the enigmatic Starfarers as they traverse the cosmos in this unique dual-character action roguelite, unraveling the mysteries of their galaxy and beyond in pursuit of the Voyager.

Title: There's No Differences: Santa
ShortDescription: Ready to test your detective skills? Find the differences between two similar holiday scenes!

Title: Eternity Egg
ShortDescription: Chaotic adventure-platformer with bouncy movement, grotesque characters & high-energy trance music.

Title: Drywall Eating Simulator
ShortDescription: A bite-sized (literally) comedic adventure where you relieve the stress of ordinary life by biting through walls. Therapy is expensive, but drywall is plentiful.

Title: Dragon and Tiger Party
ShortDescription: "Dragon and Tiger Party" is a turn-based strategy card game with "Dragon" & "Tiger" camps, supporting single-player (vs AI) & two-player (vs player) modes—flip cards to fix your camp, move strategically, battle with card number restraint, aiming to eliminate opponent’s cards or draw.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War
ShortDescription: Battle for the title of Pirate King in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War, the official real-time strategy game. Live the pirate’s life: lead fearsome fleets, plunder priceless treasures, and fight alongside legendary Captains. The seas await, claim your destiny!

Title: Unto Deepest Depths
ShortDescription: Unto Deepest Depths is a turn-based strategy game where all units must move and attack every turn. Build your party, upgrade your units, and lead them into the unknown to vanquish the horrors below in this punishing roguelite where any move could be your last.

Title: Catjong 2: Pawprints in the Snow
ShortDescription: Catjong 2 is a mahjong-3 game with a playful cat! Enjoy 200 winter levels and build your cozy Alpine fair with Pawprints in the Snow.

Title: GGWG: Goose Game Without Goose
ShortDescription: A fantasy boardgame where you play an intrepid hero on a mission to free the kingdom from evil. Guide your adventurer through a dark abandoned castle filled with monsters, traps, and rival other paladins racing for glory. So, roll the dice. Your quest awaits!

Title: Insurance Worker Game
ShortDescription: A fast paced clicking and paperwork simulation game where you race against time to process insurance claims, earn money, and beat your best score!

Title: Secret Of The Boarding House
ShortDescription: A journalist travels to an abandoned boarding house to investigate the disappearance of children during the Soviet era. After a car accident, he wakes up in an unfinished building and must survive by exploring dark corridors, avoiding monsters, and uncovering the secrets of the past.

Title: Still Space
ShortDescription: Blast through waves of aliens and rogue machines in a 2.5D twin-stick shooter where chaos, color, and cosmic horror collide. Survive psychedelic arenas and face the ultimate Lovecraftian nightmare.

Title: Retail Therapy
ShortDescription: Retail Therapy is a little First Person Shooter where you beat, fight and rob stores while racking up as much as you can money to get more stuff until you can't anymore. The holiday rush only ends when you do.

Title: Blueman
ShortDescription: Blueman — a grim intern simulator set inside a hellish corporation.

Title: Stellara Vanguard
ShortDescription: Battle increasingly deadly hordes in an action-packed survivors-like with tower defense elements. Create unique builds, unlock and place towers, upgrade your character, and fight to defend the Kingdom of Stellara.

Title: SMBH : Super Massive Black Hole
ShortDescription: This game is a casual single-player experience. Move through vast cosmic landscapes in 3D while collecting characters and items. You're sure to find yourself smiling at the nostalgic sci-fi gimmicks and mechanics. Enjoy a robust sci-fi adventure!

Title: Rhyolite
ShortDescription: Rhyolite throws your crew of up to 4 players into a pressure cooker of broken train mechanisms, complex enemy attacks, and an ever-shifting puzzle of resource and attention management as you capture ghosts on a haunted steampunk railway.

Title: Kamikaze Strike: FPV Drone
ShortDescription: Fly a kamikaze drone through fast-paced FPV missions. Dodge bullets, sneak past jammers and radars, and crash into tanks, troops, and enemy bases. Discover diffferent drones and face tougher challenges in every level.

Title: Idle Defragmenter 95
ShortDescription: A relaxing idle simulator inspired by classic 90s defragmenters. Watch your system reorganize itself, upgrade your setup, and drift into pure retro calm.

Title: Lords of the Void
ShortDescription: Lords of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy world on the brink of extinction, shattered by a devastating magical Calamity. Lead your people to victory through tough battles, uncovering unique stories behind each faction.

Title: Nekotype Keyboard Cat Simulator
ShortDescription: Hi there! I'm NEKO, your tiny typing buddy - a super fast keyboard companion. Every time you type, I type along. I don't just type for fun, I'm here to bring a bit of cuteness and energy to your workspace. Keep typing, and together we'll create every line, every idea ♥

Title: Ashes of Creation
ShortDescription: Ashes of Creation is an old-school take on the modern MMORPG set in a living, reactive world where your choices shape civilization. In this PvX open world sandbox, players will build cities, forge empires, and lay siege to foes. Uncover the Ancients as you fight to reclaim the fallen world of Verra.

Title: Food Facility
ShortDescription: Food Facility is a 2D factory automation game where you design and build complex production lines to create delicious food, sell your goods, and grow your business empire!

Title: Until the Fields: Farmageddon
ShortDescription: A whimsical single-player story-driven puzzle adventure where you switch between animals, each with their own personality and abilities to escape the farm before it’s too late.

Title: CINCILLA
ShortDescription: CINCILLA es una aventura metroidvania 2D de fantasía oscura con temática pixel art. Explora un misterioso pueblo con más de 50 niveles interconectados y descubre los misterios que se ocultan entre los Hilos y la Superficie.

Title: Ultra Void
ShortDescription: Ultra Void is a short, experimental incremental game about humanity's final ordeal.

Title: Ass Kicker
ShortDescription: In Ass Kicker, fight and dodge your way through enemies and explore the cursed lands of Askverg in search of the not-so-perfect party of heroes to defeat the dark lord of the hour and give these champions the kick in the butt they need to get going!

Title: 神魔山海经 Gods Monster
ShortDescription: A pet-catching game with an idle mode. The protagonist possesses the potential of monsters, including heroes from different planes. Collect equipment, pets, and skills from each plane through battle. Enjoy the fun of idle mode!

Title: Gully Champ
ShortDescription: Rise from the slums of Mumbai to international cricket glory in this narrative-driven sports RPG. Master card-based cricket strategy, explore an open world, and forge your destiny through choices that matter.

Title: Drowning Ashes
ShortDescription: The Ashes ignite once more, and the floodwaters rise to drown an accursed kingdom. Explore the ruins of the Capital, recruit wild monsters, and find a way to end the ruinous Cycle in this turn-based monster collector from the makers of Guile & Glory: Firstborn.

Title: Alchemy Factory
ShortDescription: Craft your workshop as an alchemist!‌ Harness arcane devices to automate crafting. Sell alchemical goods, fulfill commissions, and rise to become a renowned alchemy magnate. ‌Multiplayer Supported!‌ Invite master designers to (ahem) contribute their expertise—let them optimize your production lines!

Title: Apee Escapee
ShortDescription: Apee Escapee is a small retro open-world 2D platformer for 1–2 players. Explore one interconnected world, find 8 randomly placed skeleton keys, do good deeds to open the Karma Door, and free the Great Apee.

Title: Terminator 2D: NO FATE
ShortDescription: Experience the thrill of Terminator 2: Judgment Day with arcade action & pixel-perfect graphics! In this unique story blending iconic scenes from the movie with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide.

Title: Balloon Full of Love
ShortDescription: This is a single player story driven arcade game about the power of love.

Title: Military Logistics Simulator
ShortDescription: Drive real military vehicles, deliver critical cargo, and master first-person logistics solo or with friends. Rescue survivors, provide infrastructure, and rebuild a war-torn region!

Title: EXODUS2
ShortDescription: A high-velocity movement-shooter following CPL CHAI on his vengeful assault against the Zephari homeworld after their failed invasion of Earth.

Title: There's Nothing Underground
ShortDescription: There's Nothing Underground is a roguelike puzzle adventure where you use random tools to solve levels in endless ways. Unlock and combine tools to tackle 100+ levels, each with unique challenges. Find creative solutions, uncover the asteroid's secrets, and survive!

Title: Phone Flipper Simulator
ShortDescription: Run a second-hand phone shop, climb from slums to the top. Honest trade or dark paths? Convince customers, invest, take risks. Loan sharks, gambling, luxury stores... Every choice leads to a different ending.

Title: Memory Keeper
ShortDescription: Create cozy, realistic rooms and save them to your digital album. A relaxing interior design simulator with no rules or restrictions.

Title: Everdream Village
ShortDescription: Build your ideal, cozy farm in a living village. Form bonds with fellow villagers to lend a hand as you grow crops, care for animals, and craft a corner of paradise. Sail across enchanted islands to discover new resources and adventures along the way.

Title: Catharage
ShortDescription: A space tactics extraction roguelite. Explore space, pick fights, collect loot, then escape. Upgrade and unlock new ships to strengthen your fleet and face tougher foes.

Title: Unbound Souls
ShortDescription: A short adventure where you fight enemies in a series of wave-based encounters. Completing the encounters opens up the world more for you to explore. Prepare in between encounters by crafting consumables to survive the next fight.

Title: Arnaud Thion's Dragons 2
ShortDescription: The fire returns. The kingdoms still smolder from your last rampage… and now, the dragon awakens again. This time, your fury has evolved — sharper claws, brighter flames, and a story forged in vengeance.

Title: Knights & Towers
ShortDescription: Create strategies, evolve and defende the castle!

Title: Political Run: World Leaders
ShortDescription: A fast-paced 3D endless runner where world leaders sprint through busy city streets, smash cars with powerful boosts and chase high scores in chaotic, comedy-driven arcade action.

Title: Tackle Box: The First Catch
ShortDescription: TACKLE BOX is a fast-paced fishing and fighting game where every catch wants to beat you up and drag you into the lake before you smack it with a rod. Cast your line, and get ready to throw hands with aquatic wildlife that absolutely did not evolve for peaceful coexistence.

Title: Outhold
ShortDescription: Outhold is a short, minimalistic incremental game that blends tower defense strategy with a deep meta-progression. Experiment with builds and find overpowered synergies to defend the dwindling fires of Outhold.

Title: Extreme Hill Driver
ShortDescription: Master brutal hill climbs with realistic physics, upgrade your car, unlock tougher maps, and race to the finish before gravity or fuel takes you down.

Title: Parcel Dash
ShortDescription: Parcel Dash is a fast paced, arcade like time trial. Plan the most efficient route to deliver packages as fast as you can and compete in online leaderboards.

Title: Observe
ShortDescription: Collaborate with your past self to change the present and influence the future. Only your vision affects the world.

Title: Deck Lite
ShortDescription: With a retro and minimalist theme, face turn-based battles with deck-building mechanics, where you need to strategize to deal significant damage while still defending yourself. Combining identical cards creates stronger spells.

Title: You Are NOT Bunnygirl
ShortDescription: Guide Bunnygirl through a lab of malfunctioning robots in this RPG about self-care! Learn how to weaponize her emotions in combat and meet unhinged robots who seem to know more about her than she does. Can you protect Bunnygirl? And...who is she, anyway??

Title: Anomalous Coffee Machine 2
ShortDescription: In this game, meet a mysterious girl who demands you use an "Anomalous Coffee Machine". Type any word to create a drink, then choose who drinks: her or you. Some cups whisper, some scream, some change what you are. She watches quietly, like she already knows what you’ll choose. Now it's your turn!

Title: Mauri Mursu's Odyssey
ShortDescription: Mauri Mursu’s Odyssey is not just a game — it’s a legacy. A journey through time, space, and the elements themselves. Dive into a world where philosophy meets action, where every battle is a lesson, and where every victory brings you closer to mastering the mysteries of the universe.

Title: Dungeon Camp
ShortDescription: Pops is “The World’s Best Camper”. But there is one destination he has yet to pitch his tent… Help Pops carry his tent through a variety of platforming challenges and be the first to journey to the end of The Abandoned Dungeon to setup for the most remote camping trip!

Title: Drift Gang
ShortDescription: Drift with up to 8 friends in a fun and physics-based cart game! Drift, bump, and overtake on competitive tracks or just relax and drive on chill maps. Whether you're here to win or to have fun, Crazy Cart offers a smooth and exciting driving experience!

Title: ULTRA VERTIGO
ShortDescription: Run, Climb, Fall and Retry - A fair platformer about running and jumping through a huge minimalistic tower made from the tears of our playtesters. Nothing is unfair, keep trying and you will succeed.

Title: The Professor
ShortDescription: 《The Professor》is a third-person point of view adventure-based game, characters are customizable, game contains various of different map settings, different bosses, intense battles, variety choices of weapons varying from different timezone, the exploration awaits.

Title: Bunker Protocol
ShortDescription: Bunker Protocol is a cooperative survival horror game set in a frozen crater, where exploration, teamwork, and limited resources decide who makes it back alive.

Title: Outbreak Zero
ShortDescription: Survive the outbreak, face the infected, and uncover the dark truth behind humanity’s last collapse.

Title: House in a Meadow VR
ShortDescription: House in a Meadow VR is a simulator with shooter elements. Build, fight zombies, and have a great time in a cozy house in the countryside. The game's unique feature is that you can play an active game or relax in virtual cozy house. Paint a 3D picture or walk through the forest looking for firewood.

Title: PROJECT LEVELS
ShortDescription: PROJECT LEVELS is a platform where you create, share and play minigames.

Title: Toilet 8
ShortDescription: You’re trapped in endless toilets. Watch these stalls carefully—every detail counts. If something’s wrong, turn back. If not… don’t you dare look behind. Or face the fart from hell.

Title: SUPER SHAPESHOOTER
ShortDescription: SUPER SHAPESHOOTER is a fast-paced, top-down, stylized action game. Take on relentless waves of enemy shapes as you fight for survival. Save up your credits, make risky choices, and construct the perfect build to make your way through to the end and defeat the final boss.

Title: Monster Hunting Party
ShortDescription: Recruit units to fight against endless waves of monsters. Combine them to make stronger ones, with 30+ options for you to choose from. Form formation with unique types of unit, which provides unique buffs and skills. Can you build the strongest party to survive until eternity?

Title: Christmas Heist
ShortDescription: A online co-op/PvP Christmas horror game. One player becomes Santa and hunts down the naughty kids trying to steal his gifts and escape the workshop.

Title: Real Car Parking Simulator
ShortDescription: Real Car Parking Simulator puts your driving precision to the test! Park a wide variety of realistic vehicles in challenging environments, master tight spaces, avoid obstacles, and prove your skills behind the wheel. Simple controls, detailed cars, and immersive parking challenges await! 😁(●'◡'●)

Title: Good Human
ShortDescription: A psychological horror experience about a lonely mind haunted by guilt it can’t escape.

Title: TetrX 360 - Eons of Time
ShortDescription: The re-imagining of an age old classic with thousands of never before thought of new features and game play.

Title: Mega Mouse
ShortDescription: In a world between worlds, there are entities known as "Shadow Cats". Take control of Mega Mouse in this 3rd person action shooter, as you seek to escape their labyrinths - learning along the journey that reality is not exactly what it appears to be.

Title: Sell & Spell
ShortDescription: Run a shop and protect your business with powerful magic. Invest your wealth to become richer, more powerful, and ultimately fund your mentor's retirement to finally earn the title of Master Wizard.

Title: My Neko Pet
ShortDescription: Bring your desktop to life with an adorable virtual cat! Watch your neko follow your mouse, play, nap, and brighten your day with cute little moments. A tiny friend on your screen to keep you company anytime! 🐾

Title: Slightly Overweight Superhero and the seven levels of death
ShortDescription: In 2140, death isn't the end—it's just the upload. Play as a slightly out-of-shape hero jumping, rolling, and respawning across five surreal worlds. Unlock secrets, dodge traps, and survive the Cloud's Seven Levels of Death… all without losing a single calorie.

Title: The Glitch prison Together
ShortDescription: Find bugs with your friends, exploit them, and escape!

Title: VortX
ShortDescription: A casual arcade style game featuring a black hole, a space ship and asteroids. Evade from the asteroids as long as you can while the singularity prevents you from actually escaping the scene.

Title: На недельку до второго
ShortDescription: A visual novel about warm summer days spent in a quiet and slightly melancholic town, lost in the post-Soviet expanses.

Title: Dramon Bowl
ShortDescription: A clicker game of collection and trading: gather Dramons, expand your lineup, and profit on the Steam Market.

Title: Peacequarium
ShortDescription: Idle aquarium sim you can keep anywhere on your screen while you do other things, or play in a full screen window you can dock or resize if you wish! Buy endless upgrades, apply trait modifiers, and complete your collection of rare, epic and legendary fish! Don't forget to wishlist!

Title: Bricked Up
ShortDescription: Bricked Up reimagines the classic brick-breaker with a vertical twist. Ascend endlessly through rising walls of bricks, smash them apart with powerful abilities, avoid cursed drops, and push your limits in the pursuit of the ultimate high score.

Title: 血姬：双生 (Vampiress: Eternal Duet)
ShortDescription: Vampiress: Eternal Duet is a noir-style 3D side-scrolling action game. You play as Miss Vampire who switches between vampire/human form and uses blood to fight in high-speed battles. To find your sister in this conflicted world, bloodshed is the last thing to worry about...

Title: Recyclic
ShortDescription: A deceptively demanding experience of a humble recycling plant worker. Shred, crush, and sort your way through a menial job while trying to keep track of the ever convoluted company policy. Clock in, recycle, get paid, repeat.

Title: Attrition
ShortDescription: Attrition is a tactical 4-player PvP card game of survival and sabotage, where every move counts — build deadly combos, outmaneuver your opponents, and be the last one standing.

Title: Raiders of Blackveil
ShortDescription: Join the rebellion against the evil cooperation Blackveil in this action-packed roguelite for 1-3 players. Select your MOBA-like champion, collect RPG-style loot and infiltrate Blackveil’s massive factory. Wreak havoc, and smuggle out loot to get INSANELY powerful!

Title: A Game About Feeding A Black Hole
ShortDescription: A short incremental game about feeding a Black Hole matter by destroying Asteroids, Planets, and Stars.

Title: Tapper's Fiefdom
ShortDescription: Build and manage a medieval kingdom in this deep blend of idle simulation and RTS strategy. Master a dynamic economy, trade in a fluctuating market, and risk resources for rare gains. Train armies to command in real-time battles or automate your path to victory...

Title: PETRACAL
ShortDescription: PETRACAL is a first person dungeon-crawler survival set in the tunnels of a cave. Chart, plan, explore, devour, stay sane, and crawl your way to escape using everything you have at your hands reach to survive.

Title: Spellbind Tactics
ShortDescription: Spellbind Tactics is a turn-based online competitive multiplayer game, where you control a small team of unique characters. Synergies and strategies are key in order to achieve victory. The game is still early in development so stay tuned for news.

Title: Coconut CEO Idle
ShortDescription: Build a coconut empire in this short incremental game! Gather coconuts, hire workers, and buy upgrades to transform your coconut startup into a coconut empire!

Title: Undeads
ShortDescription: Embark on a risky but exciting journey through the world of Undeads. Search for weapons, armor, supplies and medicine. Survive or hunt survivors. Enjoy unique matches, sell your loot, and fight bloody and challenging battles against the background of the zombie apocalypse!

Title: Synthetic Paradox
ShortDescription: Synthetic Paradox is a sci-fi action rogue-lite mixed with tower defense elements. Fight never-ending waves of enemies and bosses, collect items and build up your defenses alone or in co-op for up to 4 players! Discover unique combinations of towers and items to help you protect your Core!

Title: How To Bike
ShortDescription: Ride a bike the hard way - the REAL way!

Title: Villainy
ShortDescription: A game of cooperation and betrayal. Gather your party of 4-10 players, but trust no one. Heroes and Villains plot against each other in quick, highly intense matches. Deception is your greatest weapon, and secrecy is the ultimate defense.

Title: Mine It Down
ShortDescription: Mine It Down is an incremental game about mining an evil wall inspired by other games like (the) Gnorp Apologue and Tower Wizard.  Chip away at the wall with the mouse first, hire masons to work that rock and build different buildings to grow your rock-destroying arsenal.

Title: Fish Go
ShortDescription: (Short Description): Relaxing fishing adventure on diverse islands. Catch fish from common to legendary, upgrade your rods and skills, and explore freely at your own pace in a peaceful PvE world.

Title: Femboy Streamer
ShortDescription: A visual novel where you play as a moderator in your son's stream and help protect him from bullies in chat.

Title: Sodoku
ShortDescription: A logic roguelite where the classic 9×9 grid meets economy, multipliers, and powerful tiles. Place numbers, trigger effects, and face bosses that twist the rules. Build synergies with blue, red, gold, and silver tiles, and wildcards like Miklo or Sharky that retrigger, copy, or transform.

Title: NO ENTRY
ShortDescription: You are a bouncer at an exclusive club. The requirements are shallow as you expect but the money is good and the desperate ones bribe. The pretty get in, and the money machines need to show they can front. No fake designer shoes allowed. It's a big club and you ain't in it.

Title: WAGAMAMA HIGH SPEC OC
ShortDescription: Kouki Narumi and the girls are back in this fan disc release with side stories featuring each of the heroines from WAGAMAMA HIGH SPEC including new stories focusing on the minor heroines as well. Enjoy the hijinks and romantic encounters in WAGAMAMA HIGH SPEC OC!

Title: Utawarerumono: ZAN
ShortDescription: Slice and dice your way through the strange and wonderful world of beloved tactics-JRPG series Utawarerumono!

Title: The Son of Art
ShortDescription: Step into an art sanctuary woven from colors, shapes, and puzzles, and embark on an unprecedented journey of the soul. You will become an art seeker, traversing the inner worlds of four 20th-century art masters, unlocking the secrets hidden deep within their works.

Title: ダンジョンに生息だ！
ShortDescription: 『ダンジョンに生息だ！』はマウスとキーボードを使用してダンジョンの生態系を自分好みに構築し、クリスタルの破壊を目論む冒険者を撃退する2Dダンジョン・マネージメントゲームです。 あなたは大地の精霊ラスタによって召喚された自然神です。あなたの持つ「ダンジョンをお手入れする力」を使ってダンジョンの地形を組み換え、生物を生み出し、捕食と繁殖に満ちた理想的なダンジョンを築き上げましょう。

Title: ARTDINK GAME LOG: Tail of the Sun
ShortDescription: The “Weird Game of the Century” released on PlayStation™ is now on Steam! “Tail of the Sun” is a simple 3D action game where you control a caveman living a wild life. Wagashi-shaped nuts, An open-world field, and avant-garde techno music... Experience a wild, pure, and simple life.

Title: BrownDust2
ShortDescription: BrownDust2 - Full Burst RPG

Title: Tales of Arcrath
ShortDescription: No matter the story, however small or grand All stories are relevant within the Book of Life

Title: Realms of Conflict
ShortDescription: Prepare for adventure in Realms of Conflict, the ultimate top down, open world indie role playing adventure game!

Title: Samurai's Odyssey
ShortDescription: Japan, 17th century. A samurai is not merely a warrior; it is a path of blazing honor, duty, and death. You are a samurai who has faced all of this. Go forth to meet your destiny.

Title: KEEP GAMBLING
ShortDescription: KEEP GAMBLING is a hostile friendslop gamble-em-up featuring LOTTO TICKET, SLOTS, CASE OPENING, and SUBSTANCE ABUSE simulations. Work with or against your friends to repay your debt.

Title: Treasurer
ShortDescription: You are the Treasurer. Manage the army, church, treasury, and people. Decide on their demands, assign tasks, distribute gold, and keep power and resources in balance. Avoid faction collapse or dominance. A political management game in an ancient Slavic setting.

Title: Fake Dream
ShortDescription: A 3D/FPS survival action horror game where you'll regret your dreams and reality. As you progress, stronger enemies will appear, so strengthen your body and weapons and equip yourself to survive. There are also various puzzle-solving and stealth elements.

Title: Execute
ShortDescription: Kill everyone in the world with a guillotine… on a cursed Win98 desktop.

Title: The Panopticon
ShortDescription: Welcome to our facility! Here, you’ll experience the thrill of strategic duels: block attacks, acquire ammo, and shoot your opponent. We hope you enjoy your stay with us.

Title: Varthos - Heir to the Throne
ShortDescription: Varthos calls you to his side. Fight hordes of monsters and undead creatures in this captivating action RPG, who have only one goal: to kill you. Fight, die, repeat — the battle for the throne of the world has begun.

Title: Bunker Constructor Simulator
ShortDescription: A simulator in which you have to build bunkers. Complete contracts from the city government and citizens to earn money to buy your own house and build your own protected underground bunker.

Title: Out of Time
ShortDescription: Out of Time is a fast-paced, multi-player co-op roguelite where your squad, gear, and teamwork decide survival. Battle through a fractured world where past, present, and future collide - facing swarms of corrupted enemies, brutal bosses, and chaotic mini-games all before time runs out.

Title: Yes Comrade
ShortDescription: Yes Comrade is a multiplayer survival sandbox where players have been based at a remote military island to complete tasks in the name of the country’s sea defence, however not everything may be as it seems...

Title: This Is Why We Don't Play Golf
ShortDescription: Golfing, but up a bizarre mountain where every 'I got it!' is a lie. A chaotic co-op physics platformer where falling is half the fun... probably.

Title: Clingy
ShortDescription: Stranded on a shattered moon, cling to your friends and magnets to escape through perilous landscapes. Fight gravity, chaos, and each other to reach freedom. Cling tight. Fling far. Escape together.

Title: Marked Souls
ShortDescription: A psychological horror visual novel where you play as a teenager sent to a mysterious boarding school after losing his parents. Make choices that alter your fate, uncover dark secrets, and face supernatural trials to survive the ancient mystical forces.

Title: Ooble Gardens
ShortDescription: Step into a cozy world and care for playful Oobles in a giant garden pot! Merge, grow and fish offerings to create an endless variety of cozy furniture to decorate the garden with to shape your dream fairy garden!

Title: The King of Assassins - The Kingdom
ShortDescription: An action RPG combat game featuring two gameplay modes: Story Mode and Arena Mode. Engage in battles against enemies, bosses, and their allies, complete challenging missions, face relentless waves and storms of adversaries, and undertake various challenges to reclaim your kingdom. Enjoy! the game

Title: CivEconomy
ShortDescription: From stone tools to iron mastery - lead families through the Bronze Age. Each household manages their own economy, specializes at their own risk, and trades to survive. Watch dynasties rise from farmers to merchants... or starve trying

Title: LetDeco
ShortDescription: Explore a world full of cute doll friends and decorate their homes!

Title: Space Rock Breaker
ShortDescription: Space Rock Breaker is a short incremental game about mining asteroids in space. Mine asteroids with guns, unlock new materials, process the ore by dropping it into a Plinko machine, and spend your credits on upgrades in a massive skill tree.

Title: Sniffin for Bones
ShortDescription: Sniffin for Bones is a cozy game about finding little hidden bones and solving some relaxing puzzles. Unwind with a game that doesn’t force you to have fast reaction times, complex inputs or be a puzzle wizard.

Title: Rocket Rally
ShortDescription: Simple controls. Fast runs. Top-down 2D rally game. Race short courses, beat target times, and go for the gold!

Title: Aeons of Rebirth
ShortDescription: Aeons of Rebirth is a short, strategic incremental journey about exploring planets and building the greatest space empires ever!

Title: Queen Anne's Lace
ShortDescription: As the Night Auditor at the Queen Anne's Lace, you only have one job: keep your guests checked in. Forever.

Title: Scott Whiskers: the Search for the Golden Cat
ShortDescription: Join Scott Whiskers on his new adventure and plunge into a colorful and family-friendly experience in a class of its own! Sun, beach and sea - sunken pirate treasures, mystical Mayan rites, a bubbling volcano - and lots of puzzles and lovable characters make for the vacation of a lifetime!

Title: The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games
ShortDescription: A tribute to the golden era of Retro gaming that brings together 7 iconic titles for the first time. This is more than a collection; it's a celebration of gaming history and the preservation of pioneering games from the '80's & '90's allowing you to relive the C64, Amiga and Spectrum versions.

Title: Come on, Fight Me!
ShortDescription: 2D hardcore fighter with "frame-perfect controls"! No supernatural moves, amplified collision feedback—pure "fist-to-flesh" combat! Pixel-precise hitboxes, 0.1s combo tolerance, full-frame response: raw martial artist freedom!

Title: The Trolling Adventure
ShortDescription: Troll Adventures is a hilarious and unconventional puzzle game created by the trolls for the trolls. Get ready to embark on a wacky journey around the world filled with mind-bending challenges.

Title: Smack The Trump
ShortDescription: Tired of hearing that blustering public figure? There’s only one solution: Smack the Trump! This is a clicker-style puzzle game where you explore the rally with your mouse and discover every interactive object on the scene.

Title: LifeOverhaul
ShortDescription: Design, build, and live the ultimate garage life. Create vehicles, trailers, and homes from scratch, customize every detail, and shape your own open world. Play solo or host friends in a growing community-driven sandbox of creativity and craftsmanship.

Title: Smashing My Phone
ShortDescription: Your phone is broken, but you have no choice but to keep using it. How far can you go?

Title: The Magical Floating Fortress
ShortDescription: Read aloud, read together or learn to read! The perfect interactive adventure book for long winter evenings, as a bedtime story or for long train journeys!

Title: X Burger: Chapter 1
ShortDescription: Prepare orders, deal with strange customers, make choices, and uncover how Sinan’s seemingly ordinary life turns into a dark story in the shadows of X Burger.

Title: Bush 1022
ShortDescription: Venture into the wilderness with a small bush plane. Challenge your flying skills by landing on rough terrain, battling the elements, and the darkness of night. Discover a variety of biomes and enjoy the beautiful views. Can you complete the full travel checklist?

Title: You are the Bomb: A Game About Rolling Bombs
ShortDescription: Collect coins, gems and gun powder, uncover secrets, and conquer epic bosses across time-based levels. Test your skills by mastering the rolling mechanics in this action-packed 3D platformer! Face dynamic environments, harness powerful abilities, and race to save the magical world of Boomerland!

Title: Luck Town
ShortDescription: This game is a card game where everything is decided with a single button press — whether you gain or lose. Your ultimate goal is to become the mayor, the highest position in the city. Push toward the top in a game where one decision can cost you everything.

Title: Santa Simulator : Christmas Factory
ShortDescription: Step into the boots of Santa himself! Reads children's letters, chooses the right gifts, delivers them at lightning speed and master the magic of Christmas in this cozy yet chaotic holiday simulator. Can you keep the spirit alive and make every child’s wish come true?

Title: Evil Doll
ShortDescription: Evil Doll is a survival horror game, where you find yourself trapped in an abandoned house with a demonic-looking doll. With five days to escape, you must solve puzzles while evading the murderous Evil Doll. Will you survive?

Title: BioMenace Remastered
ShortDescription: The classic 2D action platformer BioMenace returns with enhanced graphics and refined gameplay. Fight your way through a city ravaged by dangerous mutants, rescue hostages, find secrets and rack up points. Locate the secret lab behind this attack and prevent Dr. Mangle from taking over the world!

Title: Hell Loop
ShortDescription: A brutal 2D platformer with 48 hellish levels, deadly bosses, and unforgiving traps. Beat the game to unlock Hardcore Mode — a merciless one-life run from start to finish.

Title: Rebels - Under the Spell of Magic (Chapter 5)
ShortDescription: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 4, and the conclusion of Book 1. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. But they do not have an impact on the ending.

Title: ReUse
ShortDescription: Fancy a shoot’em all with a little bit of resource management. Join Theo on his perseverance to kill monsters by crafting deadly weapons using whatever he can scavenge from his surroundings.

Title: One Shot Challenge
ShortDescription: Grab your gun and pan and battle insane food enemies! With only one bullet per run, rescue your family and stop the evil Mr. Burrito.

Title: Your Mom
ShortDescription: Your mom is here, come quickly to play happily with your mom.

Title: GORE RAPTURE
ShortDescription: Gore Rapture is an SC-Fi FPS Adventure!

Title: RED DAWN
ShortDescription: RED DAWN is an SRPG game with cute graphics! Take command of Baker squad and fight back against Tiesov's invasion! The Winning or Losing of Carimae School is depends to you.

Title: We Used to Play Here
ShortDescription: Daniel wakes up to the same nightmare every night. A girl he cannot escape. When he finds a missing child report tied to his childhood home, he returns to uncover a truth buried in twisted games and shattered memories.

Title: Aliens in Miami: Fuhrer's Return
ShortDescription: As the confirmation of an alien spacecraft headed towards earth made at all news media, amongst the following imminent carnage, you, as Johnny, decided to stand up for humanity directly in the trajectory of unthinkable, and what comes next will be even more beyond impossible!

Title: Santa's Legacy
ShortDescription: Step into Santa’s boots and manage the most magical workshop on Earth! Build, craft, and deliver gifts before Christmas morning in this cozy holiday management adventure. The spirit of Christmas is in your hands!

Title: Rockoon
ShortDescription: Rockoon is a game that combines a linear narrative with dark humor and third-person shooter elements, offering the player an unconventional experience while reflecting a unique comic inspired style. Be a master of the sword and save the troubled.

Title: EvoSprout
ShortDescription: EvoSprout is a casual, stress-free, small-scale farming simulator in a cozy low-poly environment. Manage your character's private garden-farm from a top-down perspective: Buy crops and upgrades, plant and harvest from your plots, and use your different stations to process and analyse your yield.

Title: Unattached: City of Shadows
ShortDescription: Freshly-graduated detective James Arnold is sent on a mission to investigate the death of the mayor of New Eastbrook, a little-known city where corruption is tradition. Investigate crime scenes, interrogate suspects, and fight criminals in a city where every choice pulls you deeper into the shadows.

Title: Arrowburst
ShortDescription: Arrowburst is a calm, relaxing, short incremental game about bursting squares and upgrading your arrow.

Title: PoligonVR
ShortDescription: Imagine a virtual world where you can create or be anything you ever wanted. PoligonVR is a powerful community driven sandbox where we give you the necessary tools to turn your dreams into virtual reality.

Title: Rhythia
ShortDescription: Rhythia is a game about aiming and hitting musical beats with precision timing, within a dynamic 3x3 grid system. Use your reflexes to target flying blocks, combine accurate aim with perfect rhythm, and finally master the leaderboards against players who challenge your precision skills.

Title: Dave's Wrecking Yard 3D
ShortDescription: It's the late 1990s all over again and you find yourself the owner of Dave's Wrecking Yard. Earn cash by filling various parts orders by phone, internet, & walk-in customers. Enjoy working at your own pace while ordering pizzas and chugging sodas.

Title: + PC Maker
ShortDescription: The game from people who love computers to people who love computers :3

Title: Not Gates
ShortDescription: Large scale computer redstone! Taking computer redstone to the next level with 24bit color screens, keyboard inputs, powerful tools like copy pasting, saving blueprints, modifying simulation speed and more, all ready to be used.

Title: Pingorile
ShortDescription: A retro-style 2D platformer where you play as a penguin collecting yellow budgies to fulfill his dream of flying. Explore diverse levels, jump past obstacles, and enjoy a colorful, music-filled adventure.

Title: RLLL: Tower of Choices
ShortDescription: RLLL: Tower of Choices blends party-based RPG, deck-building, and roguelite elements. Roll dice to move, make choices that matter, and build your perfect party through class advancement and companion recruitment. Discover powerful synergies between artifacts and skills with each new run.

Title: The Space Between (Subatomic Forge)
ShortDescription: A 2D, open-world indie combat RPG set in an unstable world parallel to ours. Fight chaotic entities and bosses, explore broken worlds, and collect unique items to customize your loadout. Warp the fabric of time and space, and discover new unstable elements to grow your power and reach victory.

Title: Wreckborn
ShortDescription: Cleanse the system of pirates, destroy their bases and free the captives. On the asteroids, build a base, mining colonies, explore asteroids and extract resources needed for survival. Develop buildings, build defenses and turn the asteroid into a fortress.

Title: Stereoscopy
ShortDescription: A virtual theater experience for Desktop PC with VR support - capable of playing Standard and 3D Video files. Supports Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad, and XR Controllers.

Title: Hangman Duel
ShortDescription: Play Hangman online! Test your word skills, solo or with friends.

Title: Leaf Blower Something
ShortDescription: Put those leaves on the street where they belong in this arcade-style game. Get as many leaves as you can into the pile before time runs out. Keep your performance level up or you'll be out of a job.

Title: Find Oann
ShortDescription: Find Oann is an action-horror game that follows the story of the protagonist, Thomas, who must solve mysteries, arm himself, and fight against horrendous creatures to survive and find the mysterious Oann.

Title: The Silent Catalyst
ShortDescription: The Silent Catalyst is a psychological horror where every room unlocks something. It's a compilation of puzzles that whisper and spaces that remember. Slow quiet dread, eerie comfort, and a story that watches you as closely as you watch it.

Title: Solar Defense
ShortDescription: Solar Defense is a Military Sci-Fi inspired Tower Defense game focused heavily on strategy and decision making. Defend key locations and repel the Pilakarr forces back to their home world to end their attack and bring an end to this war.

Title: debris
ShortDescription: A science based builder with event-driven story set in Mars' orbit. Extract scarce resources from debris and build your drone and station to survive. Space isn't against you it is just brutal. Build your drone, clean the orbit, save Mars.

Title: VR Blasteroids
ShortDescription: Classic arcade action reimagined for virtual reality! Dodge, blast, and survive as you pilot your ship through swarms of asteroids and enemy drones in fully immersive 360° space battles.

Title: Warped - Space Horror
ShortDescription: Sci-fi space survival horror.

Title: BioKept
ShortDescription: Conquer dungeons and hoard epic loot in this auto battler adventure! Command 72+ beasts, master strategic combat, and claim your throne in the loot-filled depths. Are you ready to reign supreme?

Title: Lane Hunters
ShortDescription: Lane Hunters is an action-packed street racing game where you skillfully weave through heavy traffic in intense 1v1 duels. Outsmart rivals with strategy and skill, customize your car, and become a street legend solo or with friends in co-op mode!

Title: Limen
ShortDescription: "Like all psychic life, creativity also comes from the unconscious. If you identify with the creative process, you end up believing that you are the creator." Limen is a game based entirely on sound. A dreamlike journey into our unconscious to discover where ideas are born.

Title: Every Step Counts
ShortDescription: Command the serpent in this unique turn-based puzzle with a role-play adventure! Each turn tests your choices: build equations in the calculator to determine your path. Calculate your survival!

Title: Blood Aliens 3
ShortDescription: Blood Aliens 3 is a cinematic, story-driven space shooter where every alien wave burns hope into defiance.

Title: Gretel's Honesty
ShortDescription: A comic-like visual novel, expressing a new story based on the fairy tale “Hansel and Gretel”.

Title: Death Trap Mountain
ShortDescription: Scale Death Trap Mountain to save your dog, Gil, from the dragon Xelthorak. A tough, rewarding platformer where skill, patience, and persistence are the keys to survival.

Title: Quantum Eye
ShortDescription: Set in a dark, futuristic united states, all citizens are watched under a highly-advanced supercomputer known as the "Quantum Eye" Machine. You are an employee at the Quantum Eye facility, but quantum eye goes sentient. Your goal is simple, SHUT IT DOWN...

Title: Planets and Pancakes
ShortDescription: Professor Pancake, the only creator of Pancakes, has been kidnapped by alien thugs and trapped across dangerous dimensions. Gather a crew of up to 5 Astronauts, survive terrifying Aliens, and rescue him before the universe loses its Pancakes forever!

Title: Youchosis
ShortDescription: Overshadowed by multiple Psychosis, you play as Keith as he overdoses and shift through realms looking for the "perfect afterlife" all from his mind and psychological view on reality.

Title: Bladefall
ShortDescription: BladeFall is a fast-paced hack-and-slash game featuring fluid melee combat, 2.5D movement, and challenging battles against varied enemies and powerful bosses. Master timing and skill-based attacks as you fight through an evolving system built to test your abilities.

Title: Decomposition
ShortDescription: Decomposition is a psychological horror and survival game in which you will face a deadly cult, solve challenging puzzles and explore claustrophobic environments as you fight to save your life and stop the Decomposition of the world.

Title: Cyberphobia: Prologue
ShortDescription: Dive into a dystopian future where players navigate a high-tech, corrupt city. As a rogue hacker, they unravel a conspiracy that spans mega-corporations, government agencies, and underground factions, all while making impactful moral choices.

Title: The Whittled Horse
ShortDescription: A boy named Thomas and his friend Evey are trusted to deliver a package. Little do they know there is a force stalking them, and what they carry will decide the future.

Title: PickingSimulator
ShortDescription: A work-style action game focused on endless inspection in a cold refrigerator. Use gloves to handle frozen products and mark documents with numb hands. Simple, repetitive action without chores or heavy lifting.

Title: Saturday Super Day
ShortDescription: Saturday Super Day is a point and click exploratory choose your own adventure game that was prototyped in PowerPoint. Play as Bobbi who wakes on a mid 90s Saturday morning with a mission: Reach the computer lab at and back up an important project before the servers get wiped for the summer.

Title: 1 Trillion Credits In Debt
ShortDescription: 1 Trillion Credits In Debt is a turn based game with one task: Pay off a crushing debt of 1 trillion credits. Master weapons, test out multiple builds, strategies, modifiers, contracts, and help the duo achieve their freedom.

Title: Bound Between Desks
ShortDescription: A mystical visual novel where ordinary school life intertwines with mysterious phenomena. Every decision you make could lead to uncovering secrets... or plunge you into even greater uncertainty.

Title: Terminal Colony Deep Core
ShortDescription: Dig deep, manage workers, research tech, and face quantum mysteries in this terminal style incremental mining game.

Title: DICTOCRACY
ShortDescription: Take charge as the President of a newly independent country, Adelphia. Build infrastructure, approve policies, juggle between conflicting priorities of the public, your ministers and other countries' leaders - All with only one action per turn and a different political landscape in each playthrough

Title: AI Kill Alice
ShortDescription: You are a malfunctioning AI. Find ways to kill your master while respecting your laws. Craft commands word by word, and outsmart Alice by finding loopholes.

Title: Legendary Tomb digger
ShortDescription: Legendary Tomb digger is a single player digger adventure game, You will play as a veteran tomb robbery expert, delving into a frozen ancient Arctic tomb. Dig deep to collect treasures from the tomb, sell them to purchase and upgrade tomb-raiding equipments, and search for a priceless secret.

Title: Soccer Fan - Online Multiplayer Football
ShortDescription: Fast-paced, action-packed soccer fun with Soccer Fan - Online Multiplayer! Enjoy dynamic gameplay and intense competition. Perfect for both football fans and casual gamers!

Title: Out of Order zero
ShortDescription: Try for free! Sort the colours faster than they arrive to win the round. Supports up to 4 local players.

Title: Escobar Simulator
ShortDescription: Build your own cartel in Colombia’s most dangerous city! Produce, trade, fight, and expand your empire. Play co-op with your friend — become partners or rivals. The road from the slums to the throne is paved with blood and money.

Title: Egg Up!
ShortDescription: EGG UP! is a chaotic co-op parkour experience. 🎉 Explore mountains as egg-carrying mice, ride vehicles, battle through obstacle courses, and either lift your friends to the peak—or knock them all the way down!

Title: Parkour Simulator
ShortDescription: PARKOUR SIMULATOR! is a chaotic co-op parkour experience. 🎉 Explore mountains as egg-carrying mice, ride vehicles, battle through obstacle courses, and either lift your friends to the peak—or knock them all the way down!

Title: Filtration
ShortDescription: Jump, bounce, blast, and fly through 12 pocket dimensions in order to harvest the precious power sources within. With robotic foes and tricky puzzles in your way, it's gonna take a lot more than Ion Cells to get through this!

Title: Carnival Massacre
ShortDescription: Drawing heavily from classic survival horror tropes, Carnival Massacre takes players on a haunting quest in a cursed theme park. Explore your surroundings, manage your messy inventory, solve puzzles and kill the four ringleaders of the park!

Title: 花咲く君が連れ出した。夏の終わりの白い花
ShortDescription: Having lost the meaning of life, Shionagi meets Ayana, who suffers from a certain illness. “Kidnap me from this boring everyday life.” He wishes to die. A girl promised death. A bittersweet summer kidnapping drama where they confront each other's “lives.”

Title: Three Kingdoms Cities
ShortDescription: In this war-torn land, you are no legendary hero from the history books, but an "Outlander" descended from the heavens. With no predetermined destiny or sworn allegiance, you step into the chaos clutching a rusted sword.carve your own path to dominate the realm?

Title: 丰裕之角 不可思议之物居住的小镇
ShortDescription: 「在遥远的异国小镇，和不可思议的生命一起生活——」 舞台为法国，「不可思议生物」居住的小镇。

Title: 让我支配你
ShortDescription: 这是一部以“女性支配”为主题的短篇视觉小说。你首次登录这款游戏，发现自己竟是被班上校霸的早古女主，于是你放飞自我，拳打霸凌咔校霸（纪文川），脚踢不听话跟踪狂学生会长（林子莫），故事由此展开……（内涵囚禁、暴力、公调等元素）

Title: 神魔武圣
ShortDescription: "Divine Demon Martial Saint" is a simulation management game full of ancient charm, taking you to experience ancient officialdom and court life immersively.

Title: CONTRAXIS
ShortDescription: Contraxis is a fast-paced 2.5D arcade action game where you trace, capture, and command escaped prisoners in the prison city of Axis. Master quick reflexes, summon assists, and survive escalating bosses to chase the highest score.

Title: The Doomed Knight
ShortDescription: This metroidvania inspired game lets you discover a fascinating world full of monsters, secrets and mysteries!

Title: 梦幻传奇
ShortDescription: "Dream Legend" is a uniquely styled survival shooting game where you'll fend off demon attacks in your sleep, bringing you an intense and thrilling level - breaking experience.

Title: Voice of Belldona
ShortDescription: A dark sci-fi roguelite deckbuilder set in a world collapsing under cosmic instability. To stop the turmoil, humanity created a white-haired, godlike girl with overwhelming power and social anxiety. Enter the Vortex Zone, summon your allies, form your battle line, and tear through the enemy forces.

Title: Dimension Girlfriend
ShortDescription: "Dimension Girlfriend" is a super popular card competitive game. Here, you will meet hundreds of beautiful girlfriends with unique personalities and characteristics. They will accompany you on this adventure full of fantasy and surprises.

Title: Quarantine Cutz
ShortDescription: A hilarious cartoon simulation where you're absolutely terrible at cutting hair. Can you overcome your nerves and total pop culture ignorance to give your family a haircut that won't crush their dreams? Probably not, but you're gonna give it your best shot!

Title: Immune Simulator Type Z
ShortDescription: In the game "Immune Simulator," the world is losing to zombies. The protagonist finds a computer with historical records of conflicts. Altering data changes the real-world balance, affecting her companions. Is it a divine salvation or devilish trap? Unravel the hidden secrets to find out.

Title: Pretty Dreadful: Heritage
ShortDescription: 「Pretty Dreadful」is a cozy point&click adventure with a grim soul. Help Re:do run away from his past or face it bravely. Decide how this story ends.

Title: Sword Sanctuary
ShortDescription: Players control a knight aspiring to become a Swordmaster. In the Sword Sanctuary, face and defeat various powerful opponents, and finally challenge the Sword Saint to claim victory.

Title: the travelers
ShortDescription: the travelers is a 2d mmo and text-based adventure. explore a massive wasteland full of history and danger. discover items, build bases, engage in combat, or work together to solve the world's hidden mystery.

Title: Grind and Dine
ShortDescription: You've lost everything and returned to your hometown, forced to start over to survive. This city is filled with both opportunities and dangers. Can you carve out a new life in this unforgiving environment?

Title: 修真幸存者（Immortal Survivor）
ShortDescription: 《immortal survivor》 is a survivor like game based on Chinese Xiu Zhen culture. During the gameplay, players will take on the role of "cultivators" and survive under the siege of monsters.By killing monsters, achieve victory in the game.

Title: Breaking Squad
ShortDescription: Breaking Squad is a fun co-op game for up to 4 players. Break out into houses, steal the most you can, buy items to gain more and stay alive the most you can until your organization eliminates you.

Title: Towerfolk
ShortDescription: In a medieval world, gather resources, build your city, and manage your people. Deal with theft and internal conflicts, complete royal missions, and fight enemies on the battlefield. Use strategy and economic management to keep your city thriving.

Title: Scarred Steel
ShortDescription: A brutal medieval roguelite where every scar tells your story. Permanent injuries, hard choices, and bloody duels shape your path in a dying world.

Title: Pixel Mart
ShortDescription: Pixel Mart lets you live out your grocery store fantasy in a pixelated form. Starting with a can of questionable pasta that may be a few years out of date, you can stock and cashier your way to unlocking even more products, and dispensable employees to do the dirty work that you'd rather not do.

Title: Gilroy's Grove
ShortDescription: Step into the forest where your shovel is both your weapon and lifeline. Fight back against twisted forest creatures, claim their corrupted seeds, and bring them to your farm and grow your weapons. Restore the forest plant by plant, Will you break the curse, or will the forest claim you too?

Title: Desktop Pomeranian Fantasy
ShortDescription: Desktop Pomeranian Fantasy is an idle RPG that runs on your desktop. Your character automatically explores dungeons, battles monsters, and collects equipment while you work or play other games. Check in during breaks to find level-ups and legendary loot. No control needed.

Title: Where Heaven Fell
ShortDescription: An unnamed climber, you search for God in your ascent to the pinnacle of the city in which the remainder of the world resides in. A lone traveler accompanies you in your climb. Dash, jump, and climb your way to ascension in this challenging 2D platformer!

Title: うちのオウムは変わり者
ShortDescription: A cryptic puzzle game with simple rules! Uncover their “obsessive algorithm” through word exchanges and aim for the title of Parrot Master!

Title: Digital Defender ORC
ShortDescription: In the dark cyber future of 200X, monsterkind needs YOUR help! As the Overseer of Retaliatory Combat (O.R.C. for short), you must protect monsters from digital assassins! Coordinate monster units and place obstacles & traps to stop the slaughter of the innocent in this tactical tower defense game.

Title: OxU 2
ShortDescription: Minimalistic 3d puzzle with portals, cubes, lasers and mobile platforms

Title: Trace of Gladius
ShortDescription: Trace of Gladius is an offline single-player VR sword action game. The player challenges four stages where fantasy monsters appear, using a sword to attack enemies with “Traces,” skills that activate when the sword is swung in the specified direction.

Title: Express No. 6
ShortDescription: Thirty minutes to New Year. You’re a train passenger. Something awful is unfolding- stop the train and survive. Look through the camera- it reveals the truth.

Title: Crossroads Farming Co.
ShortDescription: You've been hired by Crossroads Farming Co. to manage their interdimensional farms. Armed with basic tools and determination, navigate procedurally generated farmlands floating in space, where paranormal events strike without warning. Complete objectives, and cultivate an endless home farm.

Title: サイバー無双 ORIZIN
ShortDescription: 『サイバー無双 ORIZIN』は、侵略された地球を奪還する3dアクションゲームです。 剣とハンマーを駆使した爽快なアクションで、群がる敵を一掃しろ！制限時間内に拠点を奪還し、ハイスコアの頂点を目指せ！

Title: Pigment
ShortDescription: All of the color has been wiped from Huey's world! Run, jump, dash, swipe, and pogo your way through this hand-drawn platformer to restore color to the land.

Title: Home Cooked Spaghetti Western
ShortDescription: Duel a gallery of nefarious rogues using pasta ingredients in this tongue-in-cheek western turn-based battler.

Title: Outbreak Squad
ShortDescription: Assemble your squad, load up your weapons, and fight your way through chaos to reach freedom!

Title: Mom Where Are You
ShortDescription: "Mom, Where Are You?" is a psychological horror game that tests your observation, memory, and courage. You play as a little girl left alone by her mother, trapped in a familiar yet terrifying room where reality begins to twist.

Title: Poppidemic
ShortDescription: A fast-paced action-roguelike. Quickly identify and eliminate the infected balloons, draft new hazards between rounds, and spend your gold wisely to build a strong roster.

Title: Arcane Plunder
ShortDescription: Explore enchanted dungeons shrouded in magical fog. Reveal hidden paths, uncover treasures, and telekinetically loot artifacts from the shadows. Upgrade your magic, extend your reach and dive deeper into the unknown in this bite sized idle clicker adventure.

Title: Rhythm Ball
ShortDescription: A rhythm game where players attack obstacles in each level by pressing the space bar according to the rhythm.

Title: Error 2351
ShortDescription: A 3D first-person horror game of survival and exploration. Search abandoned halls and buildings, solve environmental puzzles, and evade relentless creatures as you uncover a chilling story hidden in the dark. By uncovering hidden clues, you’ll piece together the truth behind the mystery.

Title: Dinostory
ShortDescription: The dinosaurs of 'Potgea' hunt for the meanings of life in this outrageous, story-driven role-playing adventure! Traverse the wilds with species-based field skills, unleash "DINOMIGHT" moves in turn-based battles, and unearth a variety of side-quests and mini-games as you get closer to your goal!

Title: Spook Ltd.: Warashi Homes
ShortDescription: This is the story of a modern Zashiki-warashi who visits a mysterious real estate agency in search of a home to haunt. Explore real apartments in Tokyo, uncover mischievous yokai disguised as everyday furniture and household items, and delve into the mysteries of Warashi Realty.

Title: WonderLang Mandarin Chinese
ShortDescription: Learn Mandarin Chinese through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combat challenges. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering Chinese. Customize your learning experience and explore a world filled with unique characters. Start your learning journey today!

Title: Office 5
ShortDescription: Protect your family. Protect your coworkers. Verify today. Office 5 is an analog indie horror experience where the player can never be certain who is human or who is unverified.

Title: Zargog
ShortDescription: A dark-fantasy horror RPG set in space. Escape the Prison-World and confront the sorcerers-guild on a post-apocalyptic world drowned in miasma. Fight the undead, mutated creatures and raging elements. Discover shrines to power-up and build your character, and be weary of the dark agents hunting you.

Title: 30 minutes until my brain dies
ShortDescription: The silence of space. The whisper of memories. The last 30 minutes before your mind fades away. A story about farewell, choice, and pain.

Title: 英雄之城3
ShortDescription: Dear lord, welcome to City of Heroes 3, an epic war strategy feast! This game is like an encyclopedia of ancient civilizations. Open it and you will experience the rise and struggle of ancient civilizations.

Title: Ignarus
ShortDescription: Awoken by a mysterious black cat on a stormy night, Vi — an ordinary boy — is lured into the Under-Realm: a dying world on the brink of collapse. As the realm’s final hours draw near, Vi must forge uneasy alliances with monsters to protect the last sparks of hope in a fading world…

Title: Charge!
ShortDescription: Light it up in CHARGE!, the laser tag-inspired sport of the future! Let loose in arena-style first-person shooter action to bounce around buildings, modify your laser weapons to bend light, and take on your friends in quick matches for territory dominance.

Title: Volcano Oden
ShortDescription: A SAVE-EVERYONE type game where, just like a 911 operator, you make decisions based on the layout of the map or even based on past decisions. The deep psychological-horror story can only be uncovered by helping everyone. Should you save them all, the truth will finally come out...

Title: Beat of Rebellion
ShortDescription: Be the voice out of the choir! Beat of Rebellion is an isometric rhythm-based Hack & Slash. Follow the Beat, create your own Melodies and unleash devastating combos to fight against a totalitarian regime in a cyberpunk city.

Title: Letherfall
ShortDescription: Letherfall is a first-person horror video game with Lovecraftian elements: the player must make their way through monstrous entities and intricate puzzles while exploring the abandoned village of Letherfall. Some nightmares don’t fade. They’re just waiting for you to open the wrong door.

Title: Project Kouvola
ShortDescription: A visual novel about a dystopian country and the things survivors must do to stay alive... The happiest country in the world is now in ruins and only a few remain alive. This couldn't get any worse...

Title: Keypress Mania
ShortDescription: Stretch your fingers and get ready for all kinds of typing that await you. Whether you're typing casually, typing for challenges, typing for rankings, typing competitively, or simply typing for practice — Keypress Mania offers it all. Press your keys and join the typing craze!

Title: MAID MOVING BOXES
ShortDescription: An anime android maid and her work drone are meeting a quota at the warehouse! A simple yet engaging game about the monotonous, relaxing process of working as a mover. Short but challenging levels, multiplayer, and lots and lots of boxes await you!

Title: Where We Echo
ShortDescription: A meditative screensaver and interactive art piece about fishing for meaning. Catch echoes of others’ lives left behind by past visitors. Release your own story into the pool anonymously. Discover how we’re all shaped by moments of connection and hope, and maybe feel a little less alone.

Title: Flipside
ShortDescription: "Flipside" is a 2D puzzle platformer game consisting of almost 150 unique levels. You need to solve the puzzles by not only jumping but also flipping the entire screen. You are going to avoid the traps by walking on walls, floors and ceilings, and even going to explore the secret levels!

Title: Shadows of Allegation
ShortDescription: One day during a study session at the campus library, you instinctively scratch an itch through your pants due to a recurring skin condition. Unbeknownst to you, a girl seated across misinterprets your action as something indecent and records a video to report you.

Title: Knights vs Nature 2
ShortDescription: The kingdom has fallen. Cursed beasts now roam the land, and only you can turn the tide. In this fantasy tower defense game, rebuild your shattered kingdom and lead the fight against an overwhelming horde of corrupted animals.

Title: Kali's Legion
ShortDescription: An open-world adventure RPG. Trade, hunt, fight, plunder, ravage settlements and cities, descend into the dungeons of long-destroyed civilizations, level up your character, assemble a squad, join factions, don't let the disaster happen again, stop the legion!

Title: Doomsday.Inc
ShortDescription: Lead a doomsday cult as... a project manager. Doomsday.Inc is a satirical strategy game where you'll manage crazed acolytes, bureaucracy, and divine ambitions. Can you bring about the end of the world without getting bogged down in paperwork?

Title: Iceburg
ShortDescription: An adventure-based, third-person co-op/single-player shooter. Destroy enemies with a variety of modern and futuristic weapons, and solve puzzles in between action-packed levels. Destroy zombies, robots, explore the locations of a secret underground base to solve the main mystery of Antarctica

Title: Farm Supply Simulator 25
ShortDescription: Farm Supply Simulator is a realistic store and production management game where players sell farm products, produce chemical and organic fertilizers and feed, and provide farmers with soil and plant disease consulting.

Title: Breaking Squad

Title: Christmas Soul

Title: Sword Sanctuary
ShortDescription: Players control a knight aspiring to become a Swordmaster. In the Sword Sanctuary, face and defeat various powerful opponents, and finally challenge the Sword Saint to claim victory.

Title: InOut
ShortDescription: A minimalist puzzle platformer where each level is more than they seem. Change your perspective on levels to discover new areas. Explore the world to unearth its hidden secrets.

Title: Mate'Morphosis
ShortDescription: Mate Morphosis is a pixel art, chess-inspired puzzle game built around the concept of becoming the piece you capture. Outsmart each board, adapt to evolving mechanics, and hunt down the rival king across every stage.

Title: Macho Harvest ~ Muscular Harvest Puzzle ~
ShortDescription: A super chaotic puzzle game of macho x agriculture! ? Let's raise various kinds of machos that are born by sowing protein in the field with care and love and ship them!

Title: Man of Nollyn
ShortDescription: A noir detective game where you can bribe or intimidate suspects for extra clues.

Title: Nonsense Defense
ShortDescription: Tower defense with a nonsense twist! Build, move, and upgrade towers, troops, and heroes on the fly. Dash through danger, pop abilities, and hire villagers to farm while you fend off endless waves solo or with up to 3 friends in chaotic co-op gameplay.

Title: Christmas Soul
ShortDescription: Santa and his helpers have been kidnapped! Mysterious aliens are plotting to destroy the holidays. Fortunately, all is not lost. Take on the role of a brave Snowman – the last defender of Christmas in a dynamic 2D platformer with arcade combat. Bring back the magic of Christmas!

Title: Cola Tycoon
ShortDescription: Cola Tycoon is an economic sandbox in which you invent iconic cola recipes, build industrial-era factories, and launch marketing campaigns to dominate the 19th-century drink market. Experiment with formulas, adapt to market shifts, and shape the industry one bottle at a time.

Title: Winter Heat
ShortDescription: Javi lives in Santiago, and Shio lives in Kyoto. They're best friends over the internet, until one fateful December changes their lives forever. A narrative game about long-distance love that takes place over chats, video calls, and social media apps.

Title: Runes of Madness
ShortDescription: Embark on a perilous journey through a dark fantasy world. Delve into perilous dungeons, battle hordes of monstrous creatures and unravel the mystery of the Runes - ancient artifacts of immense power and corruption. Shape your destiny: rise as a Hero or fall to the Madness.

Title: Harvest Reaper
ShortDescription: Scythe spinning, bullet-hell, hoard reaping action.

Title: 12 Labours of Hercules XIX: Pandora’s Gift Box
ShortDescription: Help Hercules stop Pandora’s icy curse in snowy, festive Hellas!

Title: Memories To Kill - The Silent Chalet
ShortDescription: Evelyn travels to the chalet she inherited from her father and finds herself caught in a relentless blizzard and dark secrets. Silence is sometimes the loudest scream. Atmospheric tension and the fight for survival await. Can you kill the past?

Title: Assmble Digger
ShortDescription: You're a genius with the ability to assemble, but you can't do anything in the big city. By chance, you pick up a flyer and find that a new mine has been excavated in a certain town, and if you join now, you will be given a house and a car. You think it's a great time to show what you're capable of.

Title: Supernatural Visual Novel "The Fourteenth Ξ (Guzai) Vol. 1 & 2"
ShortDescription: Middle school girls face final exams and a deadly supernatural game. An urban legend of a “nonexistent telephone pole.” The “Eight Sisters,” silver assassin, and mysterious “RULERS.” A supernatural suspense of survival and conspiracy. Ongoing story continuing to unfold.

Title: Salvager
ShortDescription: Physics-based arcade, top-down space shooter. Pilot the Salvager, collect salvage to upgrade your ship, balancing an economy by mining asteroids and fending off waves of enemy ships, ultimately growing so large as to destroy planets.

Title: Grimslair
ShortDescription: You don’t level up—your cards do! A survival deckbuilder where you bargain with the Grim Reaper to bring your girlfriend back from the dead. Build & craft in harsh biomes, rescue lost pets that fight for you, inscribe Soulwords to customize cards, and recover notes to remember why you’re here…again.

Title: Burdock 2
ShortDescription: Burdock 2 is a single-player action-horror game. Explore a lost place in a post-apocalyptic future, and help the main character's friends, or leave everyone behind and embark on the path of darkness. Find all the clues and open the way to the passage. Solve puzzles and do not lose your composure.

Title: F*ck This Job
ShortDescription: Tired of work? In F*ck This Job, release your pent-up stress! Use office supplies as weapons and face off against colleagues, bosses, and managers. Your goal is simple: escape this hellish company alive!

Title: Cosmo's Industry
ShortDescription: Cosmo's Industry is a point-and-click, inventory-management adventure where you run an old, run-down shop that was abandoned by its previous owner. With the facilities damaged or lost entirely, it's your job and pleasure to recover as much as you can while satisfying the needs of your customers.

Title: Couch Party!
ShortDescription: A casual local-multiplayer party game for everyone. Outsmart your friends on the board, compete in quick mini-games, and collect the most crowns to win!

ShortDescription: A mysterious, unforgiving, atmospheric, psychological tale of long dead world twisted inward.

Recruit new sinners into your gang, rob stagecoaches and banks, roam the prairies, and evade the sheriff and his hounds. Will you get rich or will you disappear in the prairies?

Title: SynForce
ShortDescription: Survive as a debt-bound operative in a broken system. Storm through corporate strongholds, manipulate markets, and slaughter lamb companies as commanded. Complete contracts for SynForce to earn your freedom, each contribution to your debt unlocking deadlier weapons and strategic equipment.

Title: Merge Cats Idle Evolution
ShortDescription: Merge adorable cats to reach higher levels, unlock special collectible felines, and trade or sell them on the Steam Community Market. Build your perfect cat collection through simple, satisfying merge gameplay with full Steam Inventory and Achievements support.

Title: WonderfulColors
ShortDescription: Wonderful Colors is a chaotic co-op game for 2-4 players. Conquer 60 uniquely challenging levels, each with its own frustrating mechanics. Victory demands perfect teamwork and synchronization. A solo story mode with 3 exclusive levels also awaits, offering special cosmetic rewards for the dedicated.

Title: The Seven Elemental Vases
ShortDescription: Explore the world in its various biomes, fight magical enemies, meet gods and legends, while trying to prevent your father from obtaining the seven elemental vases in this retro-style story, where gods and humans meet again, thanks to the help of a simple mortal.

Title: Ultra Mega Dungeon 64
ShortDescription: A top down ARPG / Roguelike heavily inspired by the Nintendo 64 era of graphics. Take charge against waves of monsters to reach the boss. Can you survive all 10 waves with careful specs into your Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, (and lucky loot drops) or be forced to try, try, and try again?

Title: Head in the Cloud
ShortDescription: In the text-adventure “Head in the Cloud,” you play as a Marine hacker on a mission to sabotage a crime syndicate’s supercomputer. When things don’t go to plan, you must use your head to survive, or risk losing it!

Title: Distorted Perfection: Battle on the Tile
ShortDescription: "Forget boring puzzles! This is a turn-based competitive puzzle game that adds strategic skill and intense mind games to the classic Minesweeper rules." The moment you confirm a safe area, you give your opponent the chance to claim a dangerous one! Exhibit logical reasoning one move ahead.

Title: Fanatic Souls
ShortDescription: Discover unique places, various bosses, and types of characters where you can level up their abilities and fight against more dangerous bosses. Dive into Fanatic Souls and enjoy the different settings.

Title: Invasion of Dave
ShortDescription: Invasion of Dave is a sci-fi, wave-based shooter! Blast through Dave’s killer robots and fight for your survival as you search for the key to his twisted home world. Use the terrain to your advantage, run for your life, or go in guns blazing in this chaotic saga of Dave & Dad

Title: Molodoy Simulator
ShortDescription: In this FPS simulator, you play with a Molodoy-style insane aimbot. React fast, wipe out everything in your path, and dominate the map with extreme precision. Get ready to kill a lot.

Title: Bouncy Bean
ShortDescription: Drop your Bouncy Bean into a pachinko-style cooking frenzy! Bounce through veggies, spices, and rare ingredients to create the perfect soup. The more special items you catch, the higher your score! So aim well and let the bean chaos begin!

Title: MergeShift
ShortDescription: MergeShift blends 2048 merging with Match-3 strategy in a colorful, satisfying puzzle experience. Place tiles, build combos, unlock boosters, and chase huge numbers in endlessly replayable, relaxing, and addictive gameplay.

Title: Kael's Cat Summoner
ShortDescription: In this 2D puzzle game summon cute furry friends by arranging spell pieces in a way that fills the grid. Kael's Cat Summoner comes with near infinite procedurally generated levels and 40 different cats to summon.

Title: Anders III: Coast Of Pain
ShortDescription: A third-person psychological thriller where you explore abandoned crime scenes, drive through eerie coastlines, scan with drones, and uncover a haunting mystery. Confront trauma, loneliness, and the past in a gritty, emotional story.

Title: Knight and Code
ShortDescription: Delicate pixel heroes perfectly merge with vibrant and fantastical Ghibli-style 3D worlds. Freely switch between two main characters, paired with a deep skills and equipment system, composing your own epic in every battle and exploration.

Title: H4CT0PL45M
ShortDescription: Play as the ghost in the machine and hack your way through the 48 levels of the puzzle-platformer H4CT0PL45M! Use your ability to possess hardware to make your way to the end of each level and complete your infiltration.

Title: Elevator Programmer
ShortDescription: Learn programming through a tour of implementing an elevator

Title: Pill Bird Remastered
ShortDescription: Pill Bird Remastered is a fast, skill-driven 2D platformer about speeding through levels as quickly as possible.

Title: catgirl bloodhunt
ShortDescription: Catgirl is dying and NEEDS BLOOD FAST ʕ!!≧ᴥ≦ʔ Hunt down cute critters + steal their life-force. In this puzzle/shooter game, the only puzzle is the slippery floor ʕ ᵔ⩊ᵔ ʔ

Title: Demon Street
ShortDescription: Fast-paced VR roguelite bullet-hell set in a neon-drenched demon city. Master five unique weapon types, stack over 40 perks, and cleanse the streets from twelve demon bosses, four mega bosses, and one ultimate embodiment of sin.

ShortDescription: Retro shooter originally made for PSP in 2025. Works through Steam (ported version with full Steam integration) and includes the original PSP build.
