Find all the clues and open the way to the passage. Solve puzzles and do not lose your composure.

Title: Goofy Golfette
ShortDescription: Where golf-kart battles meets a chaotic score race ! You'll blast your way to victory (and maybe a few friendships) with nitro-fueled dashes, charged shots, and unique golf-kart skills.

Title: Car Rental Simulator
ShortDescription: Run your own car rental lot in this detailed simulator. Manage reservations, clean and service vehicles, and keep customers happy. With time-based tasks, strategy elements, and high replayability, every day brings a new challenge.

Title: 12 MONTHS TO LAUNCH – 🎲 PRODUCER'S GAMBLE
ShortDescription: A lighthearted resource-management game of running an indie game studio! Play as a first-time indie game producer, making critical decisions for your team's future while balancing quality against viral appeal. Will you become a laughingstock among players, or a shining star in the industry?

Title: 帰宅 -kitaku-
ShortDescription: I want to go home! Such a chilling experience awaits you.This is an exploration-based action horror game depicting the terrifying experience of a newly hired salaryman in an underground parking garage.

Title: 黒王国物語 VisualNovel.
ShortDescription: A dramatic visual novel about a fallen kingdom, where a young princess and her allies begin a journey to reclaim hope from the ruins of war.

Title: Quantum Curse
ShortDescription: Purge the corruption that has befallen a highly advance civilization.

Title: Macho Harvest ~ Muscular Harvest Puzzle ~
ShortDescription: A super chaotic puzzle game of macho x agriculture! ? Let's raise various kinds of machos that are born by sowing protein in the field with care and love and ship them!

Title: Man of Nollyn
ShortDescription: A noir detective game where you can bribe or intimidate suspects for extra clues.

Title: Psycho
ShortDescription: You’re trapped in an endless nightmare, reliving the same haunted night over and over. Every time you escape your house, reality resets. Haunted by grief and stalked by a relentless presence, can you solve the twisted puzzles and face the truth to break the loop?

Title: Drop Point
ShortDescription: How long can you last in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies? Will you team up or go solo?

Title: Mahjong Realms
ShortDescription: Dive into a world of mystical, alien realms in this unique take on mahjong solitaire. Unlock new themes as you advance and design your own layouts to share with the community.

Title: Where Heaven Fell
ShortDescription: An unnamed climber, you search for God in your ascent to the pinnacle of the city in which the remainder of the world resides in. A lone traveler accompanies you in your climb. Dash, jump, and climb your way to ascension in this challenging 2D platformer!

Title: うちのオウムは変わり者
ShortDescription: A cryptic puzzle game with simple rules! Uncover their “obsessive algorithm” through word exchanges and aim for the title of Parrot Master!

Title: Digital Defender ORC
ShortDescription: In the dark cyber future of 200X, monsterkind needs YOUR help! As the Overseer of Retaliatory Combat (O.R.C. for short), you must protect monsters from digital assassins! Coordinate monster units and place obstacles & traps to stop the slaughter of the innocent in this tactical tower defense game.

Title: OxU 2
ShortDescription: Minimalistic 3d puzzle with portals, cubes, lasers and mobile platforms

Title: Capybara Against Humanity
ShortDescription: Have you ever played a Tower Defence? Well. On this one, you don't place towers; you place obstacles in which waves of silly human invaders keep crashing into! You can also get dirty and personal by pushing the invaders away yourself!. Or throw a rock at them. That could also work!

Title: Imperfections
ShortDescription: Imperfections is a 2D space shooter, where you build your own battleship, manage energy and heat to fight off enemies and bosses.

Title: Not For You
ShortDescription: Narrative experience from the mind of Thomas Hunt. Skateboarding Cows? Sentient boxes? A deep, emotional melodrama about the video games industry? Yep, it's got it all!  NOT FOR YOU is a collection of short experiences, which you can play in any order you would like!

Title: SANTAQUEST
ShortDescription: Embark on SANTAQUEST, a festive grind through the frozen North Pole! Play as Santa himself, battling holiday foes, collecting loot, and upgrading your gear to save Christmas. Snow, steel, and sleigh bells collide in this wintery RPG adventure from NecroCatic Games.

Title: Dead Sector: Outbreak
ShortDescription: Survive on an infected island after a deadly outbreak. Build, fight, and uncover the truth behind the Dead Sector in this intense zombie survival experience.

Title: Grenzgänger - Aus der DDR in den Westen
ShortDescription: Jena, 1984. Assel, Michael, and Hanna live in the GDR and fight against state surveillance. Can they bring about the necessary changes, or will they have to flee? Help them find their way! [Only available in German!]

Title: Voidnomaly
ShortDescription: You finally got a good job, with an incredible payment for just 4 days of work. Get into the mansion, find the anomalies, complete your daily quota, and leave. The company said there isn't any life or death risk, but you may face "weird" things. It doesn't sound too dangerous. Easy peasy.... right?

Title: Type Planting
ShortDescription: Type Planting is an idle clicker desktop pet game.Work, type, slack off, you can AFK anytime. Collect plants and decorations, and unlock more tractors!

Title: Smash Hit!
ShortDescription: A tactile treasure hunt on your table. Smash stones, uncover hidden relics, and grow your collection — Smash, Sell, Upgrade, Repeat!

Title: EXIT DATA
ShortDescription: This simulation observes players heading toward exits and retreating when they sense something unusual. When the count reaches 9, the AI’s “learning” is complete. Note: The AI is a fictional element within the story, and no actual AI technology is used.

Title: Faded Star
ShortDescription: A fantasy turn-based throwback to classic 2D games.

Title: Trace of Gladius
ShortDescription: Trace of Gladius is an offline single-player VR sword action game. The player challenges four stages where fantasy monsters appear, using a sword to attack enemies with “Traces,” skills that activate when the sword is swung in the specified direction.

Title: Express No. 6
ShortDescription: Thirty minutes to New Year. You’re a train passenger. Something awful is unfolding- stop the train and survive. Look through the camera- it reveals the truth.

Title: TINFISH SOLITAIRE
ShortDescription: strategic deck-building solitaire where you place fish on a grid to build combos. refine your pool of fish and find a winning strategy

Title: Pimpalot
ShortDescription: Strut into Pimp-A-Lot, where you build your empire from the streets up. Customize your slick old-school pimp, recruit hos, connect clients, and stack that paper. Buy businesses, throw hands with rivals, and show the city who runs the game... 'cause respect ain’t given, baby, it’s earned.

Title: FruitFall Catcher
ShortDescription: Test your reflexes by catching fruits each level everything is faster and different, how far can you reach? but be careful of the bombs!

Title: Nomad Nightmare - Episode 2: Haunted House
ShortDescription: The sequel to the psychological horror Nomad Nightmare. The protagonist tries to return to a normal life, but the past finds him again. Explore a mysterious house where fear and madness lurk around every corner.

Title: Crossroads Farming Co.
ShortDescription: You've been hired by Crossroads Farming Co. to manage their interdimensional farms. Armed with basic tools and determination, navigate procedurally generated farmlands floating in space, where paranormal events strike without warning. Complete objectives, and cultivate an endless home farm.

Title: サイバー無双 ORIZIN
ShortDescription: 『サイバー無双 ORIZIN』は、侵略された地球を奪還する3dアクションゲームです。 剣とハンマーを駆使した爽快なアクションで、群がる敵を一掃しろ！制限時間内に拠点を奪還し、ハイスコアの頂点を目指せ！

Title: Pigment
ShortDescription: All of the color has been wiped from Huey's world! Run, jump, dash, swipe, and pogo your way through this hand-drawn platformer to restore color to the land.

Title: Home Cooked Spaghetti Western
ShortDescription: Duel a gallery of nefarious rogues using pasta ingredients in this tongue-in-cheek western turn-based battler.

Title: Outbreak Squad
ShortDescription: Assemble your squad, load up your weapons, and fight your way through chaos to reach freedom!

Title: Mom Where Are You
ShortDescription: "Mom, Where Are You?" is a psychological horror game that tests your observation, memory, and courage. You play as a little girl left alone by her mother, trapped in a familiar yet terrifying room where reality begins to twist.

Title: Merge Cats Idle Evolution
ShortDescription: Merge adorable cats to reach higher levels, unlock special collectible felines, and trade or sell them on the Steam Community Market. Build your perfect cat collection through simple, satisfying merge gameplay with full Steam Inventory and Achievements support.

Title: WonderfulColors
ShortDescription: Wonderful Colors is a chaotic co-op game for 2-4 players. Conquer 60 uniquely challenging levels, each with its own frustrating mechanics. Victory demands perfect teamwork and synchronization. A solo story mode with 3 exclusive levels also awaits, offering special cosmetic rewards for the dedicated.

Title: The Seven Elemental Vases
ShortDescription: Explore the world in its various biomes, fight magical enemies, meet gods and legends, while trying to prevent your father from obtaining the seven elemental vases in this retro-style story, where gods and humans meet again, thanks to the help of a simple mortal.

Title: Ultra Mega Dungeon 64
ShortDescription: A top down ARPG / Roguelike heavily inspired by the Nintendo 64 era of graphics. Take charge against waves of monsters to reach the boss. Can you survive all 10 waves with careful specs into your Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, (and lucky loot drops) or be forced to try, try, and try again?

Title: Head in the Cloud
ShortDescription: In the text-adventure “Head in the Cloud,” you play as a Marine hacker on a mission to sabotage a crime syndicate’s supercomputer. When things don’t go to plan, you must use your head to survive, or risk losing it!

Title: Distorted Perfection: Battle on the Tile
ShortDescription: "Forget boring puzzles! This is a turn-based competitive puzzle game that adds strategic skill and intense mind games to the classic Minesweeper rules." The moment you confirm a safe area, you give your opponent the chance to claim a dangerous one! Exhibit logical reasoning one move ahead.

Title: Fanatic Souls
ShortDescription: Discover unique places, various bosses, and types of characters where you can level up their abilities and fight against more dangerous bosses. Dive into Fanatic Souls and enjoy the different settings.

Title: Invasion of Dave
ShortDescription: Invasion of Dave is a sci-fi, wave-based shooter! Blast through Dave’s killer robots and fight for your survival as you search for the key to his twisted home world. Use the terrain to your advantage, run for your life, or go in guns blazing in this chaotic saga of Dave & Dad

Title: Molodoy Simulator
ShortDescription: In this FPS simulator, you play with a Molodoy-style insane aimbot. React fast, wipe out everything in your path, and dominate the map with extreme precision. Get ready to kill a lot.

Title: Bouncy Bean
ShortDescription: Drop your Bouncy Bean into a pachinko-style cooking frenzy! Bounce through veggies, spices, and rare ingredients to create the perfect soup. The more special items you catch, the higher your score! So aim well and let the bean chaos begin!

Title: Scarred Steel
ShortDescription: A brutal medieval roguelite where every scar tells your story. Permanent injuries, hard choices, and bloody duels shape your path in a dying world.

Title: Terra Request
ShortDescription: Take the reins as a planet manager. Build up the planet's surface and orbit, appease the three factions, and take advantage of special abilities. But watch out, if you're not careful, you might just lose control.

Title: Pixel Mart
ShortDescription: Pixel Mart lets you live out your grocery store fantasy in a pixelated form. Starting with a can of questionable pasta that may be a few years out of date, you can stock and cashier your way to unlocking even more products, and dispensable employees to do the dirty work that you'd rather not do.

Title: Gilroy's Grove
ShortDescription: Step into the forest where your shovel is both your weapon and lifeline. Fight back against twisted forest creatures, claim their corrupted seeds, and bring them to your farm and grow your weapons. Restore the forest plant by plant, Will you break the curse, or will the forest claim you too?

Title: Where Heaven Fell
ShortDescription: An unnamed climber, you search for God in your ascent to the pinnacle of the city in which the remainder of the world resides in. A lone traveler accompanies you in your climb. Dash, jump, and climb your way to ascension in this challenging 2D platformer!

Title: Head's Adventures:chibichibi
ShortDescription: A cooperative (maybe sabotaging) platformer that blends action-jumping and physics simulation. You can challenge solo or team up with a friend locally or remotely in two-player mode to unlock even more unexpected ways to play. Healing balloons and time-race to unlock more subsequent levels.

Title: Cheong-un: Indigo Cloud
ShortDescription: A Korean traditional fantasy card RPG where you return to the past to face destiny. Features deep philosophical storytelling and 3v3 turn-based strategic combat. All stories are free with no stamina cost and no Pay-to-Win.

Title: Look Both Ways
ShortDescription: Look Both Ways is a Co-op game where you and up to 4 friends are handcuffed and have to get to the other side of the street. Levels get progressively more difficult, and sanity will be lost.

Title: Clockwork Cleanup
ShortDescription: Clockwork cleanup is a auto-battler game where your actions are dictated by tiles of various shapes placed in a grid. Defeat waves of enemies to save the factory!

Title: Minsgon Simulator
ShortDescription: Hatch mysterious eggs to discover unique Minsgons! Feed, train, and grow them. Showcase and sell your beloved creatures in your own shop, expand your collection, and rise to fame in the world of Minsgon!

Title: DIGI-DOLL
ShortDescription: A relaxing dollhouse decorating simulator featuring text-based discovery. Use the retro DIGI-DOLL console to explore the attic, where choice matters! Unlock various dollhouses, befriend characters, and uncover stunning furnishings as you design and decorate with flair!

Title: Oblation: Prince of Corruption
ShortDescription: Oblation is a top-down, pixelated open-world RPG where you explore a vast land, level up your stats, and recruit support characters to uncover a deep truth.

Title: Clayground
ShortDescription: Welcome to Clayground—the next-gen multiplayer VR experience where imagination knows no bounds! Whether you're a VR veteran or stepping into virtual reality for the first time, Clayground invites you to a playground like no other.

Title: Midnight Tower Defense
ShortDescription: Midnight Tower Defense is a roguelite tower defense strategy game, where you must fight endless waves of enemies either by hand with melee, or by purchasing towers and upgrades to fight from a distance. Every wave the can enemies grow stronger, with every 10 waves being a boss wave.

Title: Cooking Stories: Fun Cafe Game
ShortDescription: Play Cooking Stories — a fun time-management cooking game! 🍳 Manage your café, upgrade and decorate restaurants, create delicious dishes, and help your star chef shine. 🌟 Explore cooking, design, and strategy in one tasty adventure. Download now and start cooking! 🔥

Title: Pirate Panic!
ShortDescription: [TRAILER THIS WEEK] Sail a physics boat with your friends to find and haul treasure, navigate to treasure islands, follow paper maps, dig for treasure, and haul it across the ocean back to your pirate outpost (but it'll probably fall on the way)!

Title: Chronomaze: Gravity Maze
ShortDescription: Control gravity, not the player, in Chronomaze: Gravity Maze—a 2D minimalist physics puzzler. Can you navigate 8 challenging, high-speed levels to beat the clock? A stylish, free game with a hypnotic soundtrack and a high-score chase.

Title: Ruadine
ShortDescription: 'Ruadine' is a single player dungeon-crawling adventure with a unique combat system. The game features a branching world to explore, mysterious monsters to defeat, and an atmospheric soundtrack.

Title: Dumbubu
ShortDescription: You will own nothing and be happy. You can't afford a house, but you can afford Dumbubu Desktop Pet. "Nurture" Dumbubu and receive random skins tradeable on Steam Market.

Title: Operation: Outbreak
ShortDescription: Your squad's vehicle exploded during a patrol, and you're the only survivor. The enemy is unusual this time. A virus has turned the city into a warzone of the undead. Get to the exfil in time or die trying. A free-to-play short and intense FPS zombie survival horror game.

Title: Drop 2 Win
ShortDescription: Drop2Win is as self explanatory as it gets; the higher the dropper score, the more money to bet with in Plinko. When a run is finished that money you won in Plinko can be used to achieve higher dropper scores through upgrades. Combine your skill and luck to achieve a new high score!

Title: Death On Holly Ridge
ShortDescription: Christmas Eve, a delivery driver turns onto Holly Ridge & becomes trapped inside a decaying house of death. Reality fractures as something hunts her through rooms that shouldn’t exist. Survive the night, uncover the truth behind the house, & escape the snowy nightmare, if escape is even possible.

Title: A Bad Space Game
ShortDescription: This is a Game about maneuvering a Spaceship through Rings all while trying to avoid some Rocks. Think you can manage? Test your patience in 8 increasingly challenging LvL´s consisting of flying through Rings Dodging Rocks and getting Boosted in between.

Title: Ba Bị
ShortDescription: The Ba Bị's game is a time limit challenge in the style of a haunted early 2000s educational software. Play as one of the unlucky kids trapped in this twisted game and help them make it out alive!

Title: Dollemma
ShortDescription: An asymmetrical multiplayer horror game with a unique appealing aesthetic. Join up to 4 friends and work together to escape the dollhouse! Or play as the Hunter and shatter the dolls before they can escape.

Title: Koloboke: Sickness Simulator
ShortDescription: This is a difficult game that takes the best from Dark Souls - the rolls 😁 Combined with a first-person camera, it turns into a truly butt-blasting mix 🔥

Title: Battle Halls
ShortDescription: Battle Halls is a tactical action game in the style of plastic toys, where using the strength of the squad, weapons, hero skills, as well as your dexterity and strategy, you have to defeat all enemies and capture all locations.

Title: Dystopia Girls : Countdown
ShortDescription: Save humanity with six girls! This is a Visual Novel RPG featuring roguelite elements. Reclaim the lost surface and experience the stories of each android girl. You have 30 days to defend humanity's last stronghold

Title: Island Of Enchantment
ShortDescription: This is a relaxing and casual little game. You need to help the beautiful girls to find their lost things. This game can provide you with a relaxing experience while also exercising your intuition and concentration.

Title: Cali and the Kingdom of the Yard
ShortDescription: Cali in new adventures! Our kitten's last adventure was an unexpected encounter with an extremely dangerous creature: a playful golden retriever wanting to make friends! Curious to know how this encounter ends? Follow new scenes from Cali's story in this puzzle game, composed of 8 levels.

Title: Escape from Irene: Parasite
ShortDescription: In Escape from Irene: Parasite, a psychological horror prequel, you play as an examiner in Duskwood. Investigate sickness, anomalies, and strange events as you search for the truth behind Irene.

Title: Holo ADV: SakuraSingularity.exe
ShortDescription: Sakura Miko and the Hololive members are suddenly warped into an alternate future timeline. In this 3D adventure game, Miko must reunite with her friends and uncover the truth of this strange world to find her way back home.

Title: 柘榴団地
ShortDescription: Take on the role of a daytime security guard in a cursed apartment complex. Monitor residents, greet guests, and handle strange incidents—just make sure to follow the rules.

Title: 柘榴団地
ShortDescription: Take on the role of a daytime security guard in a cursed apartment complex. Monitor residents, greet guests, and handle strange incidents—just make sure to follow the rules.

Title: Phantom Demon Siege
ShortDescription: A third-person shooter where you battle demons, monsters, and supernatural horrors in intense, stage-based survival action.

Title: Chronomaze: Gravity Maze
ShortDescription: Control gravity, not the player, in Chronomaze: Gravity Maze—a 2D minimalist physics puzzler. Can you navigate 8 challenging, high-speed levels to beat the clock? A stylish, free game with a hypnotic soundtrack and a high-score chase.

Title: Ruadine
ShortDescription: 'Ruadine' is a single player dungeon-crawling adventure with a unique combat system. The game features a branching world to explore, mysterious monsters to defeat, and an atmospheric soundtrack.

Title: Lana: Queen of Ancient Egypt
ShortDescription: Dive into a world of mystery, face diverse foes and unleash the power of ancient gods in this action-puzzle adventure. Upgrade your abilities, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden secrets!

Title: Streamers Cleaning Simulator
ShortDescription: Restore order and cleanliness to the rooms of famous Gaming Streamers after their epic gaming sessions. Find artefacts, explore streamers life. Play co-op with your friends.

Title: The Beast Within
ShortDescription: The Beast Within is a cooperative horror escape game. You are an agent dispatched to a sealed research facility where CGI Corporation once conducted unethical experiments.

Title: My Car My Life
ShortDescription: Build the car of your dreams to compete in intense drag races, featuring detailed mechanics, advanced customization, and realistic physics. Tune every part of the engine, control the revs with precision, and win through reaction and skill.

Title: Sweet Chaos
ShortDescription: Destroy countless enemies with powerful weapons and impressive spells! Upgrade your skills to counter the masses of enemies! Sweet Chaos is a Auto-Shooter with cute heroes and diverse worlds.

Title: LES MILLS XR DANCE
ShortDescription: It’s fun. It’s fitness. It’s DANCE! Learn and master dancing in the most fun way with +40 sessions, multiple dance styles and difficulties, with real-life, official Les Mills instructors.

Title: The December Job
ShortDescription: The December Job is a short first-person horror stealth game built with that classic feel. Navigate a maze like workshop filled with dimly lit hallways and storage rooms as you attempt to collect a target number of deserved gifts.

Title: Love Limit
ShortDescription: Your blind date invades Earth!?

Title: RogueJack21
ShortDescription: RogueJack21 is a Blackjack-inspired deckbuilder where you build and upgrade your deck to battle your opponents. Navigate through procedurally generated casinos and take revenge on The House, the ruthless mafia ruling Noir City that stole everything from you.

Title: A Killer Chat! Christmas
ShortDescription: In this festive standalone addition to the satirical dating chatsim Killer Chat! series, journey through the serial killer server’s past, present & future to learn more about the gang and find the true meaning of Christmas. What's the worst that could happen?

Title: Fortress Fury
ShortDescription: Fortress Fury is a survivor multiplayer tower defense roguelite. Endless hordes of enemies want to crush your tower! Buy weapons and upgrades to craft an array of overpowering builds. Will you be able to survive all waves and be the last tower?

Title: The Bestest Alchemist
ShortDescription: Solve puzzles and brew potions in The Bestest Alchemist, a strategic match-3 roguelike! Freely arrange ingredients to create magical combinations, discover 100+ new recipes, and upgrade your collection to build powerful synergies. Your journey to becoming a master alchemist starts now!

Title: Casino Tycoon: Sin & Win
ShortDescription: Rise from a broke gambler to a casino kingpin in this high-stakes sim blending management, gambling, and adult content. Win big, indulge in luxury, go bankrupt, or start a gang war—every choice writes your destiny. In this city, you either rule the tables… or end up in a ditch.

Title: Fate of the Minotaur
ShortDescription: Within this narrative VR experience FATE OF THE MINOTAUR, players descend into the mythical labyrinth, learn about the Minotaur’s tragic story and confront him to escape.

Title: P.I.S.
ShortDescription: This is a steampunk puzzle game where you click or drag with your left mouse button to solve puzzles and free the protagonist from difficult situations. There's no text in the game.

Title: Forage & Brew
ShortDescription: Forage & Brew is a game where you play as a Cat witch in her potion workshop. Explore the forest, gather ingredients and brew magical potions in order to help the many clients that will come for your aid. How will you decide to live it out each passing day?

Title: みつめ
ShortDescription: 『みつめ』は2人プレイの協力型ホラーゲームです。精神世界で分裂した2人の「私」となって異変を探し、終わらない負の輪廻から抜け出しましょう。

Title: Marble's Marbles
ShortDescription: A love letter to the classic marble games. Help Marble find his lost marbles and roll through physics-powered worlds packed with wild challenges and quirky contraptions.

Title: Manchester's Crimes: The Beginnings
ShortDescription: Manchester, Zjednoczone Królestwo, rok 1889. 21-letni Wilson Hellberg poszukuje śladów zabójcy swojego brata w rozległym, wrogim mieście. Eksploruj bogate ulice oraz ciemne zaułki i przeprowadź śledztwo, które zbliży bohatera do upragnionej sprawiedliwości.

Title: 101 Dogs Hidden in Mexico
ShortDescription: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in Mexico🐾 in the hand-crafted landscape. 🏆 Earn tons of achievements. How many 🐶 can you find? 🔎 Be quick! ⏱️

Title: 101 Dogs Hidden in Brazil
ShortDescription: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in Brazil🐾 in the hand-crafted landscape. 🏆 Earn tons of achievements. How many 🐶 can you find? 🔎 Be quick! ⏱️

Title: RogueJack21
ShortDescription: RogueJack21 is a Blackjack-inspired deckbuilder where you build and upgrade your deck to battle your opponents. Navigate through procedurally generated casinos and take revenge on The House, the ruthless mafia ruling Noir City that stole everything from you.

Title: A Killer Chat! Christmas
ShortDescription: In this festive standalone addition to the satirical dating chatsim Killer Chat! series, journey through the serial killer server’s past, present & future to learn more about the gang and find the true meaning of Christmas. What's the worst that could happen?

Title: Putt Down
ShortDescription: Putt down is a first person mini-golf horror game, where you use a shotgun as a putter. Keep your shotgun in good condition and your stress levels in check while battling both randomized golf courses and horrific monsters. Will you survive or will you be putt down.

Title: Super Pinball Adventure
ShortDescription: A colorful casual pinball game for all ages and skill levels. Delight in knocking out enemies, collecting coins and solving the puzzle of each level! A fun and quirky reimagining of a beloved arcade classic with all the dopamine-hits of those games from your childhood.

Title: Fortress Fury
ShortDescription: Fortress Fury is a survivor multiplayer tower defense roguelite. Endless hordes of enemies want to crush your tower! Buy weapons and upgrades to craft an array of overpowering builds. Will you be able to survive all waves and be the last tower?

Title: Project Rebearth
ShortDescription: The game is set in a post-apocalyptic utopia where you rebuild society after a global collapse. A massive online multiplayer where everyone plays on an exact replica of planet earth. Grow your town, trade with other players, face challenges and discover the rich history of the planet.

Title: Feed the Lie
ShortDescription: NEWS CENSOR: edit headlines, replace words, and approve only the “safe” stories. But remember: one wrong word can end your career.

Title: 春泥 Soil of Rebirth
ShortDescription: 《春泥》是一款刑侦题材的悬疑解谜推理游戏。2018年中秋前夕，刑警程佑接到报案，动身前往泥塑匠林家处理一起家庭伤人案。随着调查深入，案件的疑点层层浮现，将她引向一连串尘封已久的谜团。往事的土壤正在松动，深埋的真相即将揭开......

Title: Forest Time
ShortDescription: Forest Time is a tactical game with a cozy experience. Enjoy various puzzles in a charming, vibrant world with peaceful yet challenging tasks.

Title: DokiDoki Hanetsuki VR: Paddle & Ink
ShortDescription: VR Hanetsuki: Win = Graffiti Her Face! Take on a cute girl in traditional Japanese Hanetsuki — the classic New Year’s paddle sport — now in VR! Parry her shots, keep the rally alive, and make her drop the feather! Of course, true Hanetsuki tradition: win and doodle all over her face!

Title: Yokai Art 2: Tales of the Nine-Tails
ShortDescription: After defeating Fujin and Raijin, Hiro and his allies found peace at his grandfather’s house. One day, Sanbi sensed a distant summon. After tracing the energy, they discovered it came from her true form—the nine-tailed fox. Determined to help, Hiro and his friends set off on a new journey.

Title: Game Of Fate 3：Clash Of Crowns
ShortDescription: An accident transports you from 1945 to 2010, embroiling you in a high-society kidnapping case. Confused and disoriented, you discover that the victim is your own descendant. Gunfire erupts, chaos escalates, and schemes unfold within schemes... Don’t want to be a pawn? How to become the player?

Title: 春泥 Soil of Rebirth
ShortDescription: 《春泥》是一款刑侦题材的悬疑解谜推理游戏。2018年中秋前夕，刑警程佑接到报案，动身前往泥塑匠林家处理一起家庭伤人案。随着调查深入，案件的疑点层层浮现，将她引向一连串尘封已久的谜团。往事的土壤正在松动，深埋的真相即将揭开......

Title: Nightmare Within
ShortDescription: Nightmare Within - is an atmospheric horror game created on the Unreal Engine 5 engine by a single developer. Explore the dark corners of the house with a flashlight and solve puzzles while trying not to scream.

Title: SAS：绝响诡计 | Case 0 风暴蝴蝶
ShortDescription: 这是一款以中式校园为背景的推理类文字游戏，你将扮演一名高中生司空茂，在开学第一天目击密室杀人事件的现场，并经过调查和推理解决案件，找出真正的犯人和真相背后更深的阴谋。但在享受侦探游戏的同时，请千万不要忽视学习。保持情绪稳定，尽量维持活下去的念头...记住，你的成绩，永远比案件要更重要。

Title: Evolve or Die
ShortDescription: A co-op voice-controlled action game where yelling is the combat system. Team up, scream into your mics, and unleash absurd sound-powered attacks. Coordinate, panic, or just shout nonsense until the enemies—and your friends—totally melt down.

Title: Dark Succubus
ShortDescription: Explore the labyrinth, collect crystal shards, uncover the truth and escape. The most important thing is: avoid the pursuit of the dark succubus and beware of this sweet temptation. (Female villain costume can be customized)

Title: Prime World: Nova
ShortDescription: Prime World Nova — a free-to-play online RPG/MOBA with an original universe, blending thrilling tactical battles and hero development. Collect talents, build an invincible team, and prove your dominance on the battlefield!

Title: This Winter of Ours
ShortDescription: Alone as two, together as one - A fantasy/yuri visual novel telling the story of two girls traversing a snow covered forest and growing closer.

Title: Steve
ShortDescription: Steve is a game that falls into the genre and theme of resource management and deck-builder, while also being a relationship simulator. The game takes place over 7 days and Steve has to manage his energy to do tasks and keep up with relationships, while fighting off bosses to survive.

Title: Feed the Lie
ShortDescription: NEWS CENSOR: edit headlines, replace words, and approve only the “safe” stories. But remember: one wrong word can end your career.

Title: LOVEPICAL-POPPY!
ShortDescription: From renowned Japanese visual novel brand SMEE, LOVEPICAL-POPPY!, the ultimate moege, arrives on Steam! Made for SMEE’s 15th anniversary and celebrating 150k+ sales, it keeps the brand’s signature sweetness while adding life-sim gameplay and a unique story progression system.

Title: The Dreaded Hut
ShortDescription: A mysterious flood swallows a small village in the Philippines. Wade through the ruined homes, drowned fields, and whispers in the fog to search for your lost sister. Be careful of the water, some things don’t drown… they wake up.

Title: Truck Company
ShortDescription: TruckCompany - is a strategic game in which you develop your transport enterprise, the aim of which is to create a great consortium with other players and compete with others for the title of the best businessmen

Title: Gamble Your Breath
ShortDescription: A claustrophobic click-based survival game where every spin, card, and choice could be your last. Earn oxygen by gambling your fate through charms, curses, and rising debt before the air runs out.

Title: The Session
ShortDescription: A mature, story-driven visual novel where a therapist and his patient slowly cross the line between professionalism and desire. Experience a tense, intimate 60-minute session that blends psychology, passion, and cinematic storytelling.

Title: FIND ALL: Christmas 2025 🎁🎄🔔
ShortDescription: Ho ho ho! The Christmas season is here again! That means it's time to test your attentiveness by exploring the Christmas suburb and finding different objects to color in the black and white picture with colorful paints.

Title: HIDDEN CATS 7: Cookie Town
ShortDescription: Explore the sweet gingerbread town while finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

Title: ISLET GARDEN
ShortDescription: 「ISLET GARDEN」 is an idle game you can enjoy on your desktop. Plant vegetation on your island, and its residents will automatically gather resources for you. Use the resources you collect to upgrade and gradually adorn your island!

Title: Roughhouzzers
ShortDescription: Roughhouzzers is a comedic side-scrolling action RPG set in the recovering dystopia of a post-war nation. With combat influenced from games like OFF and Space Funeral, an active time battle system keeps things fast paced and hectic. Follow three different characters as their adventures converge.

Title: No God! Please No!
ShortDescription: By the Goddess's will, you are the chosen hero. Cooperate with your allies to vanquish the incoming enemies and safeguard the village from the threat! (Note: The threat is not limited to just the enemies.)

Title: Everyday I Play Board Games with a Summoned Eldritch Girl
ShortDescription: Outer God girl × Socially-Inept Shut-In Comedy

Title: Schizophrenia
ShortDescription: Schizophrenia is a game where you have to not go crazy and get out of the bunker. Use all the items you can find to survive. Remember. The main thing is not to go crazy. And further. Don't make loud noises. They can hear you.

Title: 它说山雨欲来
ShortDescription: 25+结局！主文游视觉小说+少量解谜+微量2d小游戏！ 古风纯架空世界观！主要元素为武侠/权谋/伪克苏鲁——具体哪个元素多看你怎么选择！ 剧本欢乐剧情阴间，结局更是阴到没边！ 你被卷入一场巨大的阴谋，三大势力向你抛出橄榄枝，是追随疯美的革命者，依附蛊惑人心的神棍，还是效忠唯利是图的富商？你的选择将解锁完全不同的剧情和人物。切记，你看到的未必是真相；小心，别让自己成了棋子。 但相信能“开挂”的你，预知、夺舍、知识碾压都会变成你的武器。你必须用你的方式打破规则，对他们造成降维打击，书写属于你自己的传奇！

Title: 时光超市
ShortDescription: 一款融合复古情怀与现代经营策略的超市模拟游戏。在《时光超市》中，你将从一家温馨的小店起步，亲手布置货架、采购商品、服务形形色色的顾客，逐步扩大你的超市。灵活运营，感受岁月静好的慢节奏经营体验。

Title: Beatcore zero
ShortDescription: Try Beatcore for free! A simple rhythm game where you hit beats as they come down the lanes. This version does not permit access to the workshop.

Title: MoonLit Journey: The Age of Deth
ShortDescription: Join us on an Epic Journey into the warped minds of life long gamers who are creating a nostalgic game, setting the player deep into a fantasy realm with a rich story line and many interactive features.

Title: Random Realms Hero Under Siege
ShortDescription: Random Realms Hero Under Siege is a fast-paced single player tower defense RTS where every match is a fresh roll of the dice. Build bases from randomized building options, lead a leveling hero and their army, and hold the line against escalating enemy waves.

Title: Interstellar Holy Spirit
ShortDescription: A multiplayer cooperative horror adventure game with an interstellar theme that can be played by 1-6 players! Players need to complete the tasks displayed on the screen of each level individually or collaboratively within a limited time and pass the Interstellar gate.

Title: Linkies
ShortDescription: You find yourself all alone in the vastness of outer space! Being alone makes you slow and weak. Take your Linky with you and confront the challenges head-on! Linkies is a co-op game that creates unbreakable bonds and makes you faster and stronger! Can you make it to the end of space?

Title: Second Odium
ShortDescription: Emerge in an unknown world as a vulnerable Victim that can't remember their past . In this disturbing RPG populated with hand drawn enemy monsters that originated on pen and paper and accompanied by human-made sound design.

Title: A Cat named Gossamergoober
ShortDescription: Purely for fun. An adorable platformer for anyone that loves cats.

Title: Vizarri
ShortDescription: A monster-taming RPG set on the planet of Valaar. Capture and train mystical creatures known by the locals as Vizarri. Battle other trainers in tactical, turn-based combat on a dynamic grid. Explore islands, collect items, and outsmart a rising enemy force. These are the Adventures of Valaar.

Title: 她于深渊
ShortDescription: 收到一条濒死求救 ：屏幕那头的少女，正独自闯入禁区。你们的时间完全同步，你睡眠时她可能正在探险。72 小时内，你的每一次选择，都将决定她能否找到亲人、活着归来。主动发问解锁她的过往，追查禁区背后的真相，揭开这场跨时空链接的秘密。

Title: Detective Pig
ShortDescription: Detective Pig — this is a world of funny little pigs! You are a detective who, like an archangel descended from the heavens, has come to deliver justice. You will need wit and the ability to foresee the future! You will become strong. Cold. Relentless. Your name is — Sherlock Pig.

Title: Crazy Eyes
ShortDescription: Brutally Difficult Score Attack Breakout/Pinball type videogame with Sensory Overloading Surreal Aesthetic and a Totally Awesome Soundtrack!

Title: Three Kingdoms: Shu-Han Chronicles
ShortDescription: A traditional turn-based role-playing game depicting the story of Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei from the Yellow Turban Rebellion to the unification of China. Featuring over 200 characters, players can recruit enemy generals (beyond the Shu Han faction) to build unique battle formations.

Title: Soulcaller's Tower
ShortDescription: Soulcaller's Tower is a 2D survival game where you play as a Soul Mage, collecting souls from defeated enemies in your tower. As you gather souls, you can spend them on upgrades for yourself or your tower. Your tower attracts enemies, so be careful not to attract too many.

Title: 1111-Strike
ShortDescription: Tactical FPS where precision shooting meets role-based teamwork — pick Grand, Tank, Engineer, or Medic to combine aim, abilities, and proximity voice to outplay opponents in ranked, casual, or custom matches for up to 16 players.

Title: The Legend of URE
ShortDescription: Resist the wind and chase the Moon.

Title: Final battle in zhifudao
ShortDescription: "Battle for Zhifu Island" is a first-person shooter game with teamwork as the core, and its game mechanics mainly include the following aspects: • Faction Mechanics • Competitive Mode Mechanics: Typically used in multiplayer Ranked matches, each faction can have up to 16 players.

Title: LYNCH
ShortDescription: You play as priests trying to prove themselves by exorcising an evil spirit.However, some of you secretly serve that very spirit... Will you perform the right ritual and banish the entity,or will you lose your life in this cursed dungeon?

Title: NightMaze
ShortDescription: What started as a simple urbex quickly turns into a nightmare: locked sewers, a trapped castle, a ruined village, and a procedural maze swarming with zombies. In co-op, search, loot, dodge, and survive together—before the undead find you first.
